name: Shyanne Burbank
text: When I walked in, my first impression was it was a very nice place. The front desk ladies helped me get situated very nice. They were nice and welcomed me. The hygienist was so sweet she talked to me and was very personable with me. Turned on music to make me feel better. The Oral Surgeon was very nice had me in and out. Will be going back again for any of my dental/oral needs!!

name: Lisa Gann
text: The staff was so nice!  The place was clean!  Everything was explained with detail. We had a very positive experience!

name: Michael Gregory
text: I've had two procedures done at the Florence location and I couldn't be happier. Dr. Morris and his staff are exceptional. They make the whole process so simple and painless. I would highly recommend this office, you will not be disappointed!

name: Diane
text: Very nice people working there. Doctor is nice and easy on the eyes too.

name: Pat Boldin
text: Staff was very courteous & efficient. They helped me a lot

name: Lynn Brewer
text:
So far everything has been great. Everyone has been very nice and professional. I have another appointment next week. If I encounter anything negative at that time I will repost.
Also, pertaining to the person that left the negative reviews about the staff being unfriendly and only caring about privileged white people. That is not true. They have forms there to fill out if you need credit. This isn't a color thing. Blacks and whites both are tired of hearing color mentioned every time you think you are not treated special. Grow up and act like you have a brain dummy.

name: Stephanie Cornatzer
text: They were all extremely nice and worked me in as fast as they could. I would recommend them to everyone!

name: Jordan Rogers
text: I usually do not write reviews, but sadly this felt necessary after the short experience I had this morning with the lady working their front desk. I arrived at the location and had mistaken my appointment to be at this location rather than the location in Sheffield. From the very short phone call I had with the woman at the front desk, I felt humiliated and taken back at how someone could come off so hateful even in such a short phone call. I explained that we must be at the wrong location & she proceeded to humiliate me for being at the wrong location and also accidentally pronouncing the doctor’s name wrong by one letter. This location recently opened and truthfully I am not surprised it has a 2.9 star rating based on the short experience I had this morning with their receptionist. This is a not a reflection of Dr. Morris and his quality of work, but of his staff. From previous reviews I have read, others have had similar experiences. It’s horrifying to know they treat patients this way.

name: WMBW Love
text: The main dentist guy was actually nice but it's the fact that if you have no dental insurance this place is very pricey! Even just to get one tooth pulled is like $500+ and it's sad that they looked disgusted when you asked if they take payments, sorry I don't have a privileged life like you working at a front desk.

name: Amber Herban
text: Loved this place! Great doctor, great nurses. Gonna try and get my mother in soon for dental surgery😁

name: Boe Jane
text:
(The guy Dustin, that left that review under mine never experienced racism because he’s privileged I’m sure. News flash there are racist people out here. Smh how dare you say that)
Anyway to my review:

They only take referrals so if you don’t have another expensive dentist to tell you to go to this expensive exclusive place then you’re out of luck.

I asked the lady at the desk if they take payments and she looked disgusted like “why are you asking”. I’m sorry not everyone is privileged like you girl. And she said no. To get all 4 wisdom teeth out without insurance is over $1,000+  and they told me I can get out 1 tooth at a time, why would anyone do that?! Is that even safe to offer.

I felt really out of place there. It’s like middle and lower class aren’t welcomed. It was a waste of $50+ co pay to just sit there and talk. But the Dentist himself was nice.

name: Linda Ealey
text: I just wasted $50 to find out that I can't afford to pay for my wisdom teeth removal, they do not take any form of payment options, they take it up front, every penny and not  everyone walks around with $1,000+ and the staff there needs to be more friendly and smile and not be so uptight and serious, I didn't feel welcomed.

name: dustin english
text: The only review from this place is from a lady that claims racism or evil white people from every review she has posted. I like that they don't except payments because it keeps their building in excellent condition because they dont have to worry about people paying them. I wouldnt say its 5 stars but for the most part they take care of their patients and do their job especially since they deal with most people at critical tooth pain. I would recommend this place to anyone.

name: Jane Otp
text: they don't accept payments on your surgery like most places do, so it's very disappointing, this place is for the white rich privelege, if you don't have a lot of money, you're not welcome here, it's a waste of time! and they don't smile, it's very negative energy.

name: Gregory Edge
text: Very professional . I didn't think you could have a good experience getting a tooth pulled.  They are some of the nicest and caring people I have done business with. Not only did they take care of my tooth but gave me a little more faith in humanity.

name: just Please
text: The receptionist is very rude. Her go to phrase is "uh yeah". So unprofessional! The doctors are great. Yet, before any major procedures they are not very forthcoming with what a patient is required to do. Patients cant have any personal belongings in their facility(during major procedures) not even your phone on silent in your pocket(sketchy AF). You must have someone sit in the parking lot while having major procedures performed. Would have been nice to know in advance. Sitting in a hot parking lot with a baby for an hour with no food or drink thanks to them.

name: Jennifer pruett
text: Denied my daughter a job because she refused the covid vaccine. DISCRIMINATION AND ILLEGAL

name: Mallorie Wiggins
text: At first I loved this place , the nurses are very nice and friendly . But they gave me an estimate for how much a splint would cost , I go through with the splint and pay them what they tell me I owe . I get back two weeks later ( no calls or anything from them ) they hand me my splint and tell me I owe them 300$ more dollars ? Do not recommend.

name: Marsha Fuckaberg
text:
Shame on this staff for illegally violating HEPPA.

That's ok.    This place might not exist in 2022.

name: Leah White
text: They deny employment to prospective employees because they are not vaccinated with the experimental "non-vaccine" that isn't yet approved by the FDA.   Even many health professionals are refusing this shot because they know the truth about it.

name: Britney Whitten
text: They are illegally requesting medical information at this facility and using that information illegally.    BEWARE!!

name: Cesii Luna J.
text: I came here to get my 4 wisdom teeth pulled out. I’m such a scary cat when it comes to the dentist haven’t been in a while decide to go bc wisdom teeth  was giving me pain called everywhere. I got recommend to this facility. My appointment was fast esp. With the whole virus going on. I’m  so blessed to have found this place for 1. They gave me the lowest price ever! I do not have insurance whatsoever.  Very worried about paying to much money this service is unfortunately kind of pricey but I’m glad the DR  blessed me with the perfect price! I got anesthesia and 4 tooth pulled out. The DR. Nurses, & front desk is very nice! They were so helpful with the whole process! I did not feel not one thing whatsoever! Came in fell asleep got up went home (: my recovery went GREAT did not suffer no pain! Today marks 3 weeks since procedure! I feel wonderful (: thank you for your service I appreciate it very much! May our god bless y’all ❤️

name: Brooke Carroll
text: This office and staff was great. Dr. Dorset did my wisdom teeth surgery and did a great job! However, The lady that did my IV was awful. She stabbed me  4 different times until she got it right. I now have huge bruises on my body and she kept getting more aggravated and aggressive when she couldn’t get it. She should not be doing IV’s anymore.

name: Christina DuBose
text: My husband loved them.  They were friendly and he didn't feel a thing

name: Terry Pentecost
text: I've been coming here since 2015 and they do a great job on my teeth. I never feel any pain.

name: sharon keef
text: They did great with our oldest and with my hubby also

name: Cindy Simmons
text: They were all great and friendly I'm so thankful that Orr could fit me into his schedule on short notice he's so nice and did a great job on my tooth I had no pain at all thank you again.

name: Lacy Jay
text: My name is bradley "sry im on my wife's phone" but I was at work Friday in excruciating pain from a wisdom tooth that all prior dr's claimed I would need surgery so I called these guys. Got me in that same afternoon and within an hr of getting there the tooth was gently removed and I was on my way. Thankfully without getting put under "which I'm no fan of in the first place" Great staff and all around great place to go. 5 stars

name: Latasha Coats
text: Very clean an nice staff very detail

name: J M
text: Very professional and caring staff. Dr.Dorsett was a life saver & was able to work me in that day. I was in excruciating pain with a broken molar & he extracted it with ease. I was overwhelmed with how much time he spent explaining every step of the procedure as it was being conducted. I'm one of those people that are extremely terrified of dentists. I'd never experienced anything like this before & he was very knowledgeable in working around my TMJ.  Professionals like Dr.Dorsett are a rare find. I would never even consider going anywhere else for any oral surgery needs.

name: Audri Edwards
text: The staff is amazing! Susan is a ray of sunshine. Always smiling. Both women make you feel right at home an treat you like family. Not a dollar sign like most doctor offices... Dr.Harrison did an outstanding job! I am very pleased with the work he did. I was in an out in less than an hour!! Plus he made sure I was not in any pain when I left... I will be going back to them to have a final procedure. I know I am in good hands with him an his wonderful staff. Very caring an loving people. I recommend them to all of my friends an family. Wonderful people an get experience! !!

name: Darlene Woody
text: Dr. Harrison and his staff were amazing. After suffering from a horrible tooth ache for weeks they got me in for my consult and scheduled my extraction the next day. Very thorough and compassionate to my situation. They called to check on me 4 times after my extraction. I highly recommend them for anyone needing oral surgery.

name: Kathy Turner
text: Dr. Harrison and his staff are exceptional.  I went in after being in excruciating pain for a month and he was so caring and personable.  I could tell immediately that he genuinely cared about helping me.  His staff is just as personable, while my experience was a little more extreme than most, Dr. Harrison and his staff were so kind and compassionate the entire time.  And I never once had to wait for more than a few minutes (and I had about six appoitments!).  My husband has also had surgery at this office and his experience was just as wonderful.  Oral surgery is awful, but Dr. Harrison and his staff are great!

name: erika smalley
text:
LOVE LOVE LOVE!
First off I had 2 wisdom teeth that bothered me for years but I wouldn't get them out due to my fear of the dentist. Susan, the front receptionist is the main person who sold me on having Dr.Harrison do my teeth. I was a little worried about his age (he's older) but in all it took them 15 mins to take both of my wisdom teeth out (one was impacted), I was sedated and it was painless! I am hardly in any pain at all (day 2) and I am so very very THANKFUL for dr.harrison and his staff! THANK YOU GUYS!

name: tasha West
text: Dr . Fairburn and his staff are excellent and professional. I was very nervous about my procedure today. The entire staff made me feel comfortable and it didn't take long..

name: Lesley McRae
text:
They got me in quickly for a cracked tooth extraction. They were able to use the X-rays I had already paid for from my referring dentist. I opted out of anesthesia and Dr Carlson took good care to make sure I was feeling alright. Very reassuring chair side manner! In and out in less than 2 hrs (including paperwork and checkout)
Am home now only feeling dull pain have not even taken the codeine prescribed for me.
So far (day one) happy with the experience

name: Harold D L Robinson III
text: Excellent service and professional staff. I had oral surgery today and the experience was outstanding. I recommend University Oral & Facial Surgery clinic to handle all your needs present and future needs.

name: Laura Findlay
text: Dr. Carlson and his staff were very friendly and comforting. I would highly recommend University Oral Surgeons to anyone they may need their expertise.

name: Teresa Hannah
text: Dr. Link and the staff are all wonderful! Great service before and after surgery. I highly recommend them.

name: Della Minor
text: Dr Carlson done a wonderful job on my tooth extraction. He had the best bedside manner and listened to my concerns. The office staff was polite and caring as well. I like to thank them for their help with the unbearable pain I was having with the tooth.

name: Morgan Watson
text: Everyone I came in contact with was above and beyond nice! Made the experience as good as it could’ve been, considering I was scared to death. 5/5

name: Ralph Bauman
text: These folks are EXCELLENT! I was missing several upper teeth and they explained various alternatives,  including implants. I chose implants, and Dr. Fairburn explained the procedure and successfully put in two implants. It was painless. He is very gentle  and works well with his professional staff. University Oral & Facial Surgery is very clean and the entire staff is very professional and courteous, which is important during this Covid crisis. I highly recommend Dr. Fairburn for your oral surgery needs. Incredible.

name: Ricky Whitt
text: Amazing staff, very professional an make you feel so comfortable knowing I was nervous lol but my first ever experience and they made it look so easy!!!!

name: Lory Hiler
text: Dr Link was great. The office is very relaxing and makes you feels at ease. The staff was great too. Thank you for taking care of me

name: Danielle Guido
text: Dr. Crawford and his staff were so friendly and made my experience so comfortable!! I have severe dental anxiety and the staff were so helpful and accommodating to my needs!!! I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who is looking for an oral surgeon!!

name: Suzanne Clement
text: Well coordinated, limited wait time and I really liked Dr Link and staff

name: Mariah Barkley Sullivan
text: I called and made an appointment almost 3 weeks ago to have a tooth extracted while under general anesthesia. I asked about prices for the procedure and inquired about getting an implant down the road. The lady I spoke with gave me a quote for everything including the bone graph required to have an implant done when healed. The price she gave me was $415, I do have dental insurance, but it still seemed lower than I was expecting. I asked her again to make sure I heard her correctly and wrote down everything she told me. Well I get there this morning and the Dr comes in to go over everything they are going to do and then another lady comes in to go over pricing again and get my payment info. She informs me that she saw the quote I was given in my notes, but she didn't know where the other lady had gotten those figures because they were not correct. She informs me it was going to be $992 for the exact same thing I was already quoted the much lower price of. I told her that I was not paying that price so she does some figuring on the computer and tells me $650ish without the bone graph to which I replied, I'm still not paying that price, she needs to go talk to the lady who quoted me the other price. She walks out for a few minutes and comes back in and says the other lady is not there today, but they can do everything but the graph for $476. I declined that price again and told her they should have to honor the price I was quoted, especially if it was in my notes. She said they could not do that, that it was just an estimate. Well I'm sorry, being quoted one price weeks ago only to get there today and it has more than doubled, is not an estimate to me. They never said it was an estimate, they specifically used the word quote! Needless to say, I am still dealing with a broken tooth because I refuse to pay more than double what I was told it was going to cost me out of pocket.

name: William Hall
text: Simply a horrible experience. First they lied to me twice. They really are just uncaring and the doctor Link laughed in my face when I told him about my long-term medical condition. At first I thought he was laughing about something else, but was clear. He seems to think my terminal disease that has been confirmed by two of the best neurological groups in the US is a joke. He changed my oral surgery without discussion, so I would need to come back for a second. And in my “unique “ case should not have any care for pain. Now I have to suffer through his malpractice. Simply, don’t go! He should have just stopped before he ever started cutting on me.

name: Jean Smith
text: Great place to go very friendly staff everything was great from start to finish.😊😊😊😊😊

name: Bianca Edwards
text: My experience today was overall a good. The staff was very polite and took safety precautions due to COVID. Mask were worn by everyone. The staff of nurses were professional and in-depth with all questions and concerns. Dr. Carlson also had great bedside manners and was well informed. First time visiting as adult, my experience was smooth with a decent wait.

name: Cynthia Stevens
text: Everyone was wonderful. The only bad experience I had was with the woman behind the desk upfront. The lady just inside the door was wonderful. This was the woman on the far left just inside. She was very rude and condescending. She gave me some papers and told me to run them out to my driver and run back. I am 69 years old and I don’t run anywhere anymore. I still have a 5 star rating because the other people in the office more than made up for her.

name: Joseph Anders Jr
text: I had a broken wisdom tooth for an entire weekend. Saw my dentist on Tuesday. They got me an appointment(due to a cancellation)Wednesday with Dr. Farnham. Everything went wonderfully from start to finish at University Oral and Facial Surgery. The ladies that work with Dr. Farnham noticed how nervous I was and made sure I was comfortable the whole time. Finally the good Dr. had that little tooth devil out of my mouth before I knew it. I’m pretty scared of dentist, but I would go back and see Dr. Farnham and his crew anytime, I just hope I don’t have to go back soon!

name: Brandy Heartsill
text: Fantastic job! I had big back molar extracted and a lot of anxiety about it. The whole team was so nice. So fast and efficient. Definitely put my safety first and my comfort. I couldn’t thank hem enough!

name: Ed Prince
text: This place has to the best oral surgeon in tuscaloosa,  maybe even in the state....very professional. I would recommend them to anyone...the procedure they do you wouldn't even know they're done...IT'S ABSOLUTELY AMAZING...THANK YOU UNIVERSITY ORAL AND FACIAL SURGERY...Really loved it all from the time I arrived...everyone was so nice...GREAT STAFF

name: m causey
text: Everyone from staff to doctors were very professional from the time I entered the office and they were very efficient. My appointment was on time and the procedure was performed as promised.  I highly recommend them.

name: Patricia Bryant
text: Very comfortable and calming environment and a very kind staff. Treated me as if I was the most important patient in the building. I will definitely go back to this office if there is ever a need to do so.

name: John Lewis
text: Great folks. Very nice and professional. I would highly recommend them

name: Ashley Addison
text: Very nice doctors and nurses also very helpful with everything that we need to have also feel very comfortable

name: Shirla Webster
text: I was treated very well by Dr Link and all of the staff here. They were all following COVID-19 guidelines. Every question was answered before I left the office so that my treatment will go smooth.

name: Darrel Jernigan
text: This was a fantastic visit. I went in for an emergency procedure. The office was complying with Covid-19 protocol. Very clean and plenty of space between patience. They put me at ease from the moment I walked in. The staff was courteous and friendly. I didn't have an appointment when I called to see if they were open. They referred me to the nurse before they would see me. It took only 1 minute for the nurse to call me back and get me in. The intake nurse was thorough. She didn't miss a beat. And she was easy to talk to. The doctor was great. He answered all of my questions and to great care to insure my comfort during the procedure. Management made payment hassle free and safe. I could not have asked for a better experience.

name: Jackie Stephens
text:
This was my first procedure at The University Oral & Facial Surgery. The office is pristine. The staff are kind, knowledgeable, and understanding. My procedure went very smoothly and quickly. The doctor and nurses were very aware of my ptsd and treated me with enormous compassion.
The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is because I am a breast cancer survivor and alerted  them that I could not have blood pressure or IV sticks on my left arm. My IV was inserted in my right arm, however, when I woke up from surgery the blood pressure cuff was on my left arm!!!! That’s a big no-no as I will now run the risk of lymphedema.

name: Sonja Minor
text: Friendly and professional atmosphere. Dr. Carlson is an excellent dentist!

name: Pat Gregg
text: I was extremely impressed with their organization during this COVID19 pandemic. They had check in perfected, making sure people wore masks, social distanced, took temps, & kept contact to a minimum. The staff was friendly and professional and Dr. Link was very thorough. He explained my issue in a way I could understand & gave detailed instructions. I highly recommend this practice.

name: Stephen Quilliams
text:
I was totally overcharged for two extractions that was coded as surgical but was actually just regular pulled teeth. Charged 640.00 dollars for two extractions. On top of 95.00 dollars for exam and 20.00 for masks and gloves. Said it was because of covid 19. Absolutely the worst place to get teeth pulled,as far as cost is concerned and no sympathy for people who are struggling financially due to covid 19.
.

name: Alabama Choir School
text: This group is made up of pure, helpful, friendly professionals. From the lady taking temps at the front door, through to the nurses, receptionists, all the way to Dr. Carlson, 100% solid!

name: Natasha Wiant
text: I had the best experience with them. They took precautions prior to covid. They worked fast to get each person in and out in a safe and timely manor. With no hesitation they work with you and answer questions quickly for you. I will definitely be recommending them!!!

name: Gabriel Louise
text: Very pleasant and a great group of people.I would definitely go back and recommend the service.

name: cassie simon
text: Wonderful experience. My 85 year old mother is here with me. She does not live here. She’s been stuck here because of Covid.  Not only did they work her in for a serious oral mouth issue, but she had no dental insurance and she got a discounted rate. Everyone was very nice and she remarked to me that she felt good because they referred to her by Mrs. and her last name. A special shout out to Brandy.

name: Mary Parsons
text:
Unprofessional call to make a appointment!

Never been here but I called to schedule a appointment and let’s just say the phone call was enough for me not to go unfortunately.
I called was asked to hold sure no problem I don’t mind holding well the lady forgot to actually put me on hold.
Well I heard their conversation how omg girl the phones won’t stop ringing I already have like 69 sticky notes of names why couldn’t these people get their teeth fixed before the pandemic.
Well I said hello about five time someone one picks back the phone and says can I hold I said absolutely not and told her I heard their conversation and wanted to speak to the manger she says she’s not here I said well let me speak to someone over you finally after asking 3 times she had someone else named Ingrid come to the phone which she was nice and apologetic she said their office is over whelmed with calls since they were closed for 7 weeks which I completely understand it’s a known fact many places are overwhelmed.
But that does not take the place of being professional and doing what job you get paid to do I feel anyways I won’t be using them.

name: Tyreece Hampton
text: Very knowledgeable helpful staff and Dr. Link put together a good plan for me on my dental procedures.

name: Michael Ward
text: Highly professional staff. Dr. Carlson seemed VERY nice. He's a God fearing man and I felt very comfortable in his presence. If you have any maxillofacial work that needs to be done, you should seriously consider University Oral and Facial. They'll make you feel right at home!

name: Traci Morris
text: The surgical staff is wonderful,  but be prepared for a little bit of attitude from the office staff.

name: Tamika Stinson
text: I scheduled appointments for both my children and the day before the receptionist called verifying only one appt. I explained that I had 2 appointments scheduled she could not find the appt for the other child. I ask to reschedule the appt and she said that I need 48 hr notice.(which was a lie based on their website it’s a 24 hr notice. I literally stayed on the phone with this smart mouthed receptionist threatening me with a cancellation fee for their mess up!!! Finally after 15 minutes with this rude person someone else gets on the phone and said they found the other appt🤨!  The day of the procedure they tell me it will be a fee. ( she said they would call later the day prior) Of course that didn’t happen. At the appointment they gave me a price to pay (before they would see one child). I paid it, shortly after I was asked to pay for the other child🤯🤯 after she finished her appointment! One would think they would let me know both prices and pay for them together. Talking about frustrated with these people!!!! Never again!!

name: Stacey Evans
text: Everyone was FABULOUS from check in until the very moment I left. My father was with me and they kept him well informed on me and gave him perfect post-op instructions for me to follow as well as a bag full of information and goodies. I had never taken the medication I was given so I made an after hours call to the on-call nurse and she gave me instructions on how to get the full benefit of the medication to keep me comfortable over the weekend. While I have always been a nervous wreck with any dental work other than a cleaning, the entire staff that I encountered made it a pleasant experience and eased my mind. Thank you to everyone who I came in contact with that day. Keep up the wonderful work!

name: Becky Forrester
text: Dr. Carlson and his staff are so kind and caring. They really know how make you feel at ease. They took great care of my son who was very nervous going in. Thanks to you all!!!

name: Taril Slater
text: Very professional! Get u in and out in no time. Very nice staff as well.

name: Ray Carroll
text:
Dr. Carlson took time to exchange pleasantries without wasting time. Never felt he was “in a rush” to move out and on to his next appointment. He conveys a concern for doing highly professional procedures and caring for the patient.
The very personable lady who guided me out of the treatment room to the billing and waiting areas was a great touch. Not only was she very friendly but particularly in that I wasn’t turned loose in the rabbit’s warren of exam room doors and disorienting hallways to stumble onto the way out.

name: Ricky Burch
text: So professional from start to finish!  Everyone could not have been nicer and genuinely cared about my well being.  Very impressed, and Dr. Clausen is the best!  I hope I dont have anymore tooth problems but if I do, I will be back!  Thanks!

name: shalka ochilly
text: I was really scared going in being 3 months pregnant, but the process was quick and painless. One of the nurses even held my hand to calm me which meant a lot to me. Definitely recommend this office!

name: Bailey Park
text: Very disappointed in my experience. Went in for dental surgery today and the day before, I was told that my insurance covered it and I didn’t have to bring a co pay. I get in the room waiting for surgery and I’m told I needed to pay 1,045 dollars up front before I could get the surgery. No payment plans, no surgery, nothing. I drove an hour to have my time wasted. Don’t recommend.

name: Tina Turley
text: Dr. Links and his staff are lovely.  Handling things as best they can through this Covid 19 pandemic.nice environment.

name: Natanya Vance
text: They always take care of me when I come in. I will never go to another oral surgeon besides Dr. Farnham and Dr. Link.

name: Cody Kornegay
text: I was very happy with my experience here. The staff was friendly and made me feel less nervous about having a tooth removed. The procedure itself went smoothly and was very quick. They answered all of my questions and concerns about recovery. No complaints.

name: Rhonda Lancaster
text: I love Dr. Fairburn! He's the best dental surgeon/medical doctor ever!! I feel safe knowing he is working on my teeth.  I'm fixing to have him do my implants.  I have all the confidence in the world in everyone at University Oral and Facial Surgery.  I'm not scared to go at all!!!!! The office staff is also great and very helpful.  Love them all!!

resp.text:
Rhonda,

Thanks for letting us know that Dr. Fairburn makes you feel at ease. Our surgeon's experience is the cornerstone of our practice.

name: Calvin Williams
text: I just came from here to get extraction for a tooth that has been giving me nothing but trouble. Dr. Carlson and his staff were truly wonderful. I was nervous but was put at ease by the terrific customer service! Thank you very much UOFS!!!

name: Donnie Lee
text: Outstanding service, everyone was very friendly and professional, really practicing social distancing

name: Nikki Hahn
text: The office staff is one of a kind. They are helpful, patient, understanding and very kind. Dr. Fairburn has a great bedside manner and did my procedure perfectly. His support staff listened to my cares and concerns and discussed future plans before proceeding.  I did have to reschedule my apt but it was nobody's fault but my own because I was late arriving. Thank you to the staff and Dr Fairburn for a job well done. I'd highly recommend him and his team and I'll be returning for any future needs myself.

name: Hunter Sexton
text: We waited 2 HOURS for a 2 MINUTE consolation about wisdom teeth removal with Dr.Link. Absolutely terrible. They told us to get there 30 minutes early, so we did. We could’ve been an hour and a half late and still had too long of a wait. We had people that got there later than us go back first. They walked in about a minute before we were gonna walk out. If I could give zero stars I very much would. If you need anything oral or facial, go to Birmingham. You’ll leave and get home sooner than you will here. Not going back. Ever.

name: IAm Shonia
text: I would definitely recommend this place to everyone I know.  Dr. Mcilwain and his staff were very kind and made sure all my questions were answered both before and after our visits.  He made my daughter,  who was the patient,  feel very comfortable.  The atmosphere was very pleasant and clean.  Our wait time wasn't long at all. They also provided an after hours number for me to call in case there were any problems after my daughter's procedure.  So many people are in the medical field because jobs are very easy to find.  What all patients need from their caregivers first is compassion and I can truly say that is exactly what we were shown at this office.

resp.text: We are so glad you had a great experience with us!

name: JAMES NORRIS
text: Great experience, staff friendly and professional. Practically no wait time. I was in in out within 45 minutes. Dr. Carlson very courteous and professional and explained everything.

name: Kim Carver
text: Staff was very friendly and accommodating. Dr. Carlson is the best always has been.

name: Terry (Lynn) Harrell
text: I am very happy with the service I received from University Oral & Facial Surgery. I was having issues with my wisdom teeth so I dropped by their office to make an appointment. Amazingly, I was able to have the procedure done the very next day. The operation was very fast and painless and, although I was prescribed pain medication to take after the procedure, it was not needed. The follow-up examination was also fast and did not require any additional payment. They even refunded part of my co-pay as the extraction surgery was not as difficult as they thought it would be. I would definitely recommend UOFS to anyone who needs dental surgery.

resp.text:
Terry,

Thanks for taking the time to leave us some feedback about your experience.
We are glad to hear that you were pleased with the surgery.

name: Sonya Blanton
text: Dr. Carlson and everyone I came into contact with here was amazing!  Thank you so much for your genuine care and concern!  I wish I could have all my dental care at this office!  Thank you all so so much! 😁

resp.text:
Sonya,

Thanks for letting us know how we're doing.
Our goal is to deliver the highest level of surgical care to our patients.

Do you think there is anything we could have done to make the experience smoother or more informative?

Regards,
Chris Pereira
University Oral & Facial Surgery
cpereira@uofsdocs.com

name: Tom Blackmon
text: Dr Roe and his staff have been kinda like family.  Whatever I needed, any questions I had and doing their work to my satisfaction.  They really did give me a reason to smile again.  I most likely will schedule visits to my home State of Alabama to retain the service I have received there as I now reside in Missouri.

resp.text:
Tom,

Dr. Roe is a great local dentist!
But I think you might have his practice confused with ours. His practice is right down the street from us.
Thanks for your time.

name: Nicole Samuel
text: I'm hella paranoid of dental offices however Dr. Carlson made me feel at ease. He was very gentle when administering the topical anesthetic and was very knowledgeable. He could probably sense how anxious I was and he was mindful enough to keep involved in the procedure by every once and a while informing me of what he doing in my mouth. All in all one one my most pleasant dental visits in my life. and ALLL the staff were super friendly!

name: Lakeidra Mims
text: Really great staff and wonderful experience. The consultation and procedure was quick and my recovery speedy. I encountered no problems. I had 3 wisdom teeth removed.

resp.text:
Lakeidra,

Thanks for letting us know about your experience.
Do you think there is anything we could have done better? We are always looking to improve.

name: Johnnie Campbell
text: I had a pleasant experience with my visit yesterday. The staff is very friendly and professional. Dr Meriwether is the best. He explained the procedure and made sure that I was comfortable throughout the procedure. I highly recommend this place for all of your dental care.

resp.text: That's great to hear about Dr. Merriwether,  but I think you may have us confused with Tuscaloosa General Dentistry just up the street.

text: Dr. Carlson was great and did a wonderful job when I had my wisdom teeth removed.  He was very personable and had an excellent "chair side" manor.  I highly recommend him to everyone.

Thanks for letting us know. It is important to us that our patients feel comfortable during these types of procedures.  Thanks again for your kind words.

name: Chelsie Booth
text: These people really care. They are understanding and smart and try to make your experience with them as painless as possible. Thank you for all your help dr's looking forward for my wisdom teeth extraction. I know i picked the right place to go.

text: The staff at University Oral and Facial Dentistry were very curtious, and professional. They made sure I understood my proceedure, and made me feel comfortable, even though this was my first visit I just felt like I was I was in good hands. I recommend them highly and if I had to do it all again I would choose  University Oraand Facial. 😁

name: Angie Sanders
text: Dr. Link removed my wisdom teeth over 25 years ago, my husband's wisdom teeth over 15 years ago and my daughter's wisdom teeth last month.  We all had great experiences.  We will be using him for my son's teeth next.

resp.text:
Angie,

Thank you for the great review!
We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us—it is so cool to know that Dr. Link has spanned two generations in your family.

name: Deloris Gray
text: I recommend Dr. Fairburn and this office. They were very caring. My husband had a procedure done and no problem with healing.

text: Dr John Farhnam took care of a stone in my saliva gland that has been there for at least 3 years with out facial surgery that 2 previous doctors wanted to do.  Done in 10 minutes.  My best doctor experience ever.

name: David Fincher
text: The staff and Dr. Fairburn were great.  It went so much better than I ever thought it would.  Thanks to all.

name: Crimson Dynasty
text:
We were sent here by our local dentist when he felt that my daughter's gum abscess needed a drainage tube put in her mouth then cut out her back teeth. When the surgeon reviewed the large x-ray, it was decided to remove just 1 tooth and he cleaned out all infection underneath it with hopes that the 2nd tooth will live.
We were also worked in on the spur of the moment because of the abscess. Very grateful they gave her other tooth a chance to live since she's still in her 20's.

name: David Taylor
text: Fast appointment,safe environment great service.👍

name: Omar Elsoukkary
text: Had 3 impacted wisdom teeth and 1 erupted wisdom tooth causing so much pain. Dr. Farnham assured me that the procedure would be a piece of cake and it was. Very happy with the service and worth every penny to have him operate on you!

text: Great experience with wonderful, friendly staff! I was wrll taken care of with great aftercare instructions. Full top extractions with no issues. I highly reccomend University Oral and Facial surgery.

name: deborah khalil
text: I had 2 teeth extracted by Dr Fairburn. The first of which he had out before I knew anything was going on. The second I was not so lucky.  The tooth  would not let go and come out so it had to be broken up by drilling and removed in pieces . Then came the packing, cauterizing and suturing all of which was not pleasant to say the least BUT Dr Fairburn was amazing, He never lost his cool. He was constantly explaining what was going on and what he was doing which helped to calm me. He even would pause and give me a minute to take a break. I am  not the easiest patient to deal with as I have a fear of dentist. He was very professional but also compassionate and kind which is rarely seen in today's medical profession. I am a RN of 30 plus years and I would recommend Dr Fairburn highly.  He has my utmost respect and admiration.

resp.text:
Deborah,

Thanks for taking the time to share your experience. The surgical staff at University Oral & Facial Surgery strive to deliver an exceptional level of care to our patients.

name: McKenna Owens
text: I had my wisdom teeth extracted yesterday, and the staff was absolutely AMAZING! They were so sweet and gentle while putting down with anesthesia. I am on day 2 of recovery and I’m feeling amazing, I’m in no pain yall! The best part is that Dr Minto called personally to see how I was doing and reassured me that my oral surgery went smoothly. I will recommend Dr. Minto to everyone! 10/10!!!!

resp.text: Hi McKenna, Thank you very much for choosing to share your experience! Your kind words and recommendation are truly appreciated. Thanks again!

name: Alexis Crain
text: I am TERRIFIED of the dentist so getting all 3 wisdom teeth extracted was nerve wracking. However, showing up to my appointment everything was on time so less anticipation in the waiting room. Every nurse was sweet to me and patient. Dr.Minto played Beyonce to help my nerves.  I had a tricky time  getting the IV started, we tried 3 sites before they finally found a good vein (Next time I will remember to drink plenty water to make it easier on them). Before the IV I got nitrous gas and freeze sprayed. Hardly felt the IV and when I woke up I was in the car almost back to Gulfshores. I wish I could get put to sleep for all my dental needs and return on back.  Thanks Dr.Minto for getting these teeth out and making this a pleasant experience for me to share!

resp.text: Hi Alexis, Thank you very much for choosing to share your story. We are truly grateful for your kind words and are so pleased that you are happy with your experience and doing well. Thank you again and please keep in touch!

name: Ashley Stockton
text: Dr. Minto and staff are wonderful!!!! Very friendly and comfortable atmosphere.

name: Frances Squire
text: I have been very impressed with Dr. Minto and his staff.  I lost a tooth and needed to start the implant process while visiting family in the area.    They explained the process and options to me and the care I received was outstanding. They have the latest technology in their office to make the process as painless as possible. The office is conveniently located with plenty of parking and shade.  If you have to go through oral surgery, I highly recommend Dr. Minto.

name: Nevin Hauser
text: This is the best experience I think I have ever had with ANY dentist/doctor/surgeon/medical professional period. I had my lower wisdom teeth removed and it went very well. The staff is friendly and they really care. I would recommend anyone who needs even the most extensive oral surgical work to go meet with Dr Minto, he is a great guy!!

name: Jackson Leigh
text: Great experience still in pain  but the staff and the doctor are very caring they understand.

name: Stephanie and Betsy Tolbert
text: Awesome group of people! Dr. Minto has the best bedside manner and the in room staff was super nice and comforting. Had 2 teeth removed with minimal issues and no pain. Definitely recommend them for any dental work!!

name: Dani Williams
text: I had 4 wisdom teeth removed today. I asked a few questions before my procedure as I have never had sedation or surgery so I was nervous. Other than that, the staff was very friendly and professional. I was pleasantly surprised when Dr. Minto called personally to check on me and discuss the procedure. It really really made all the difference!! Would highly recommend to everyone!

name: braxton agee
text: Great staff, Great facility. I had two severely decayed teeth resulting from impacted molars that required surgery for removal. The dentist and assistants are very thorough in explaining procedures, surgery, post-op recovery and potential complications. I was given the option of a general or local anaesthetic and the surgery itself went very smoothly. Of course, all of this is very expensive without insurance but that is the case everywhere.

name: Cassie Hadden
text: During this crazy pandemic of COVID-19, I had a tooth break off and create major problems in my mouth. I called several dentists, only to be told they’re closed. This office, however, not only called me back a few times, they got me in as soon as possible, and fixed my problem. The staff and the Doctor were so very kind. They took the time to talk to me, understood my problem, and made me feel comfortable the entire time. I can’t say enough wonderful things about the level of care I received from this place! You all made a bad situation so much better for me, and  I’m so thankful for each of you!

name: Quyston “Lady Toros” Watson
text: I just had my wisdom teeth  removed as well as one more tooth. Even though they put me to sleep normally I’ll feel things in my sleep but I didn’t feel anything. While I’m recovering he called to check on me and my brother to make sure we was doing fine

name: Sherry Abbot
text:
We are from out of town and are here visiting for the month of December.  I had a back molar I knew had been cracked for some time but had been able to baby it and get by, until 2 weeks ago.  My tooth became immensely painful with swelling to my ear and under my chin.  I called Dr Minto’s office and they got me in for a consult that afternoon.  The next day I was back in his office to have the tooth extracted.

I cannot say enough good things about the professionalism of the entire staff, the quality of work  and bedside manner.  I am horrified of the dentist.  Dr Minto immediately put me at ease.  He administered conscious sedation and removed the tooth without me feeling or being aware of a thing.  When I woke the relief was immediate.  I was sent home on antibiotics and a strong anti inflammatory. I only took the anti inflammatory for a couple of days.  My recovery has been painless and without issue.

I am so appreciative of the care I received by Dr Minto and his staff.  I could not have asked for a better experience.  Thank you.  Merry Christmas to you and your staff.

Sherry Abbot

name: Martha Lavallet
text: He is an awesome Doctor and a sweetheat. His staff are wonderful too. I would recommend him to anyone.

name: megan bossard
text: Caring and responsive staff!  Clean office- and an amazing Doctor!  Don’t go anywhere else!  You will not be disappointed!  I keep asking Dr. Minto to handle all my dental needs... cleanings, fillings etc.... this is a great office!

name: Robert Heiking
text: Dr. Minto and his staff provide excellent service.  I had two molars extracted using just local numbing for the procedure.  The extractions were pain free thanks to Dr. Minto's expertise.  Fortunately  I didn't need to take any medication after I went home.  Thank you Dr. Minto and staff  for making my visit such a positive experience.

name: MK Chapman (SacredRockStars)
text: We love Dr. Minto and his wonderful Staff. The office is beautiful and very well kept. You feel like family and he is by far the best experience we have had in the dental field. I highly recommend! Thank you for making Caylee’s wisdom teeth surgery so easy!

name: Katherine Stauffer
text: Best dental experience ever (even for a tooth extraction) ! He truly cares about his patients and makes you feel comfortable and at ease.

name: Josh Holliday
text:
I Had a great consultation at this facility. The staff and Dr. Minto were both kind and insightful. The facility was phenomenal and the wait time was limited. Above all you can tell this staff cares about the patients.

Thank you if you took time to read.

Josh

name: Brittany Sheppard
text: My son (age7) needed emergency work done and Dr. Minto used his lunch break to fix a mistake another surgeon did. He was the kindest man to my son and did a great job with him. The whole staff took care of us from the moment we walked in the doors until we left. I will be forever grateful.

name: Olivia Baugh
text: I took my daughter to see Dr Minto in March for her 3rd molar extractions. Her appt was at 9am on a Monday and we were back home by 11am! She bounced right back later that week. Dr Minto is very personable and is a very skilled surgeon. She was nervous and he was very kind and understanding so with a personalized treatment plan of sedation he was able to remove her wisdom teeth with zero complications before, during, nor after. Everyone at this office is top notch from the doctor, to Lindsey at the front, to Breanne his assistant and we appreciate that he called to check on her himself later that night!! I highly recommend Dr Minto’s office. Thanks so much guys!

name: Travis Rodgers
text: Great doctor and team.  We have enjoyed working with them.

name: BobPat
text:
In March of 2018, I had Dr Minto remove a #14 upper left molar which had a bad cavity and was prone to breaking. He did it with local jaw numbing and skillfully pulled the tooth with no pain. His assistant was very helpful also. He gave me a pain prescription and detailed instructions on recovery, which I followed and had no problems in it healing in a few days. In fact, I barely used the prescription for pain.
I would recommend him highly.

name: Brenda Copple
text: Pulled a wisdom tooth for my husband, quickly, no pain.. if in need would be right back.. he even called and checked on him that night.. great facility.

name: Felicia Logan
text: Dr. Minto and his staff are great, friendly and verly clean office. I had 3 teeth pulled which one was broken to the gum line. I swear he was done within 30-45 minutes with minimal pain. I highly recommend him.

text: I was super scared about having my wisdom teeth removed, but everyone was super compassionate (even though I may have been more hard on them than I should have been; sorry 🥺). I just wish I could’ve seen what the wisdom teeth looked like after the fact. 😃

text: I had a lesion removed from my tongue. The staff were very friendly and professional. Dr. Hudson is an outstanding oral surgeon. He is not only extremely skilled but he is a very caring doctor who sincerely cares about his patients. His staff are also highly caring, kind individuals. Highly recommend!

text: This place is great. If you need any type of work done I would definitely recommend Dr. Hudson. The staff are very polite and caring. Very efficient- in and out no sitting around waiting. You will be very happy with the care you receive.

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate the recommendation. Your kind words have made our day!

name: Frank Churchill
text: Dr. Hudson and his staff are very professional and courteous. I went in on a Wednesday for tooth pain and told him I wanted to have the tooth extracted. He did a great job and I would highly recommend him for anyone who wants excellent dental care.

resp.text: It was our pleasure to make your experience as pleasant as possible. Thank you for taking the time to write this review.

name: Haylie Allen
text: I was very pleased in the service I received from Dr. Hudson an his staff, they eased my nerves about surgery an they encouraged me to take the next step to getting my teeth fixed.

name: Melissa Eakes
text: I had a great experience with Dr. Hudson and his staff. The office and rooms were super clean and the staff were all friendly and professional. I came in for a wisdom tooth extraction and was very nervous about the sedation, as it was my first time ever being sedated. Dr. Hudson and his nurses listened to my concerns, and took the time to explain the process. They put my mind at ease, and the entire procedure was over with before I knew it. I would 100% recommend this office.

name: Kevin Dong
text: Very quick and painless

resp.text: Our pleasure! Glad to hear you had a 5-star experience. Thank you for recommending our practice.

name: Latoya Adams
text: Well unfortunately we (my daughter and I) didn’t have the best experience with the nurse at this facility or the front office worker. The Dr. did have good bedside manner in my opinion, however, my daughter did seem to have some unusual extreme swelling even after 48 hrs  following the instructions of icing the area etc. I’m not absolutely sure why this occurred but the office has been emailed and I’m still awaiting a response. I have a rare genetic disease that unfortunately my daughter has the gene for and if not carefully watched certain medications given can turn the gene into the disease. I wasn’t informed what type of medications they planned to give her prior to the procedure when I asked to know the nurse seemed to have an attitude and reluctantly told me to come back to see. While back there talking about the list with the doctor the incompetent nurse proceeded to start my daughters I.V. Instead of at least waiting until we had finished determining if the medications were indeed okay all while rolling her eyes. Which was so disrespectful I can’t even imagine how such a person in a field of care could show such disregard but I guess that’s how she was raised to be. I’m not sure. However, there are two office staff members that are always most helpful that sit on the side. The lady at the front when you walk in was not very thorough she didn’t make sure I had the cost information prior to the day of the procedure in writing (I had to ask for it as well as the code explanations), she also didn’t make sure my daughter had an excuse for school but did offer one to the Caucasian lady that came in after me just not to me for some reason 😒. However the lovely lady on the side provided what I needed which I am most grateful for. As I said there are good staff members it’s just probably half good, half bad but the doctor was nice 50% of his staff I would say need some serious retraining and empathy towards others if they are going to stay in that field or look for another industry where care isn’t essential.

name: Susie Shelton
text: My daughter had severe pain and swelling for more than 3 weeks following wisdom teeth removal in October. We returned 4-5 days after surgery for a re-check. Dr. Hudson had very poor bedside manner and was very condescending to my 22 year old. They also charged $100 over quoted price out of pocket. We had another daughter scheduled for consult but changed oral surgeons and had wonderful experience in December at North Alabama Oral Surgery. We do not recommend Dr. Hudson.

name: Charlotte Sharpe
text: Dr. Hudson was the sweetest and kindest man.  He explained every step he was going to take from when he was making the incision to pulling the tooth.  He and his staff were just precious.  Would highly recommend him.  Charlotte Sharpe

name: Monique Fisher
text: Got all four of my wisdom teeth removed. I had insurance that wasn’t well known & they accepted it. I felt comfortable the entire time. I also got put to sleep and woke up just fine. Recovery was good & it put my mind at ease. Glad they are out & I recommend them!

name: Daniel Marchand
text:
My wife had a fantastic experience here, glad we found a good oral surgeon who takes our insurance (United Healthcare) locally. Everything was billed correctly, great coordination with the insurance company,  great staff, procedure went smoothly (tooth extraction) - happy customer!

The other place (also in-network) we went to charged $81 for an initial consultation (due to incorrectly coding services) plus quoted upwards of $200-300 to do an extraction (same insurance), we paid $66 TOTAL here and the consultation was 100% covered as it's supposed to be.

I hope we don't need to use this place again, but if we need an oral surgeon we're coming back for sure.

name: youknowit158
text: Dr. Hudson has horrible bedside manner! However he is amazingly great Doctor! For me it's more important for the doctor to be good at his job than have a good bedside manner. That's why I gave him a five star. His staff on the other hand is quite friendly and very professional.

name: M N
text: Dr. Clint Hudson was the absolute worst experience with a medical professional we have encountered. His arrogance and lack of empathy made for terrible bedside manner. After removing all four of our 16 year old daughters wisdom teeth on July 3rd, she was in recovery longer than anticipated. I waited patiently until I was called back to sit with her. She apparently hadn’t  tolerated the  Anastasia well. They released her to be taken home while her eyes were literally still rolling back in her head as the nurses walked her out. Over the long holiday weekend, dry sockets formed. I realize this is something that sometimes happens and isn’t necessarily the fault of the surgeon. My daughter was in agony, with pain medication doing nothing to dull her pain. When I called the after hours emergency number, listed on the discharge instructions sheet provided to us, they were completely useless. I seriously don’t even know why they have one. I was rudely told twice, once by the after hours staff member who answered the phone and again by Dr. Hudson himself to “call the office during regular business hours to schedule an appointment. “  At that point, I debated going on to the ER, but decided to have her at Dr. Hudson office as soon as they opened the following morning. We arrived 15 minutes prior to opening, signed in 2nd, only to be “worked in” to the schedule. While my daughter sat in the waiting room in misery, no urgent attention was shown. When we were finally called back, dr. Hudson examined and packed a bottom socket. My daughter did not receive relief as the dr. and his staff insisted she would. She kept trying to tell them the pain was coming from the upper socket which Dr Hudson and his assistant would NOT hear of, nor would he even look at.  They told us repeatedly she was wrong, and the pain she felt wasn’t coming from the upper socket, bc it was basically unheard of to develop an upper dry socket. They also repeatedly tried to get us to leave,  saying she would feel better in 15-30 minutes. I finally stated that I wasn’t leaving with her until I knew she was relieved. Dr. Hudson then SHOVED his hand into the top of her mouth asking “is THIS where you’re uncomfortable?!?” She grimaced and moaned in pain and tears flowed. Even I began crying just watching the scene. I absolutely was in shock and disbelief at what had just happened. Then, he stepped back and admitted it appeared to be an upper dry socket. He also admitted he couldn’t remember the last time he’d packed an upper, and that he didn’t know that he ever had. Once it was packed, she did get relief from the pain within a few minutes. I suppose Dr. Clint Hudson is an adequate surgeon so long as the patient doesn’t have any complications from the surgery, and if the complications aren’t rare or unusual. If there are complications, better hope they only occur during regular office hours. Since there is no way of knowing beforehand if these will occur, I’d suggest finding a different oral surgeon. I believe in giving credit where it is due, and there was an assistant who works for Dr. Hudson named Micki who was very sweet and sympathetic. On the flip side, another who I believe name was Jan was as rude and uncaring as the Dr. himself.

name: Pamala DeWerff
text: My experience is I got referred by my dentist because he was a TMJ specialist. Went for appt he came in room looked at X-rays from my dentist. He did not examine or xray me. Said he would have to resend me to a dentist in another town. Then I got bill for $190. Don’t waste your time or money. Tried to talk to staff and they were rude and argumentative. Again save your money and time.

name: Ajasha Long
text: This is an excellent oral surgeon. I was absolutely terrified of having my wisdom teeth removed but the surgeon and staff were very knowledgeable and made me feel really confortable. It was over before I knew it. There was some slight discomfort after the surgery but nothing compared to the pain that I had experienced because of the excruciating pain of the teeth growing in. I would recommend this facility to anyone.

name: Christy Hudson
text: Dr Çlint and his staff was good with my mama and she recommended him to me

name: Teresa Veal
text: Removed my daughters wisdom tooth. Five star all the way.

name: Amal White
text: Had two teens go his staff was great and the doc was firm but good.

name: Jeepsalive1 katz
text: This guy is fantastic.  He also has an amazing and well trained staff.  I would not go anywhere else.  I had zero issue and very very little pain.  Highly recommend!!  Absolutely the best there is.  Worth driving in from out of town.

name: Gail Mitchell
text: My experience was horrible, first of all the entire staff in the front office wrre awesome very respectful. On the other hand his assistant was very rude not saying anything to me other than telling me what she wanted me to know. I had to pay for my services cash. Once I got the shot in my mouth he didn't wait long enough to do my extraction because I was feeling the pain. I was trying to let him know but he said not much longer he was getting infection out would not let up period. I left out that office in tears. He did call the next day to check on me I wanted nothing else to do with that man. It's been 6 to 7 months ago and I have no feeling in my bottom jaw and have of my lip on the left side of my face.

name: Mack Sheehan
text: Everything about my experience with Dr. Schmidtke has been great. He was knowledgeable about my medical needs as well as my dental needs and took excellent care of me. His nurse, Jo, was very kind and remembered us from our consultation. To top it off, Dr. Schmidtke called me later that afternoon to see how I was doing. That really made my day. This is a one of a kind medical practice.

name: Rebecca Swinson
text: My mother saw him for an extraction, he pulled her tooth before the numbing took effect. She told him to stop and HE DIDNT STOP. Would not recommend to anyone, you might as well pull your own tooth.

name: Lee Myers
text: I got my wisdom teeth taken out, he was very nice and made it as pain-free as possible. I couldn't be put to sleep because of an underlying medical condition, but he gave me enough anesthesia for it to not be a horrible experience. He even called that night to make sure I was alright, which I thought was really awesome. Great experience overall and I will definitely go back if I have any more problems with my teeth.

name: Cassundra Whigan
text: Wonderful place to go and get your wisdom teeth extracted... I was nervous at first but overall great experience. He also called that afternoon to check on me which was wonderful.

text: I absolutely loved this doctor! First time going here, and he was amazing, makes you feel so comfortable! Amazing staff!! I’m 25, and he’s the first doctor that I felt totally comfortable with!! Takes good care of you and takes pride in his work! His wife works with him too and I thought that was awesome!!

name: Gerri Paulk
text: Dr Schmidtke is awesome. He is so caring and gentl . Truly a genuine Doctor.  Genuine person.

name: Robert Bloodworth
text: I have been two or three times he is a great person all around, he has great staff also.

name: John Dawson
text: This was my second surgery with Dr Schmidtke and as the previous time every thing was performed flawlessly on a difficult tooth extraction, hardly any discomfort after the surgery. Thank you very much Dr Schmidtke, your skills are certainly at the top of your profession.

name: Gregory Douglass
text:
This person is unethical, it is no wonder he left Vail Colorado. This person I listened to, telling the nurses how though my face was broken  in five places, and my 3 piece tongue was bleeding and in pain, that because I did not have insurance, he would rather leave me sitting on the front porch of the hospital, hoping for a transport over 100 miles away, because he is a douche bag

Worthy of zero stars, and he was paid in full for his services.  Absolutely criminal, do not let him touch yourself, or your children.

name: James Daniels
text: Had daughters wisdom teeth pulled. Before I left the office she was crying/balling in pain. They tried to tell me it was because the anesthesia makes girls emotional. Not buying it. I paid $400 for anesthesia and pain med that didn't work. Had to wait an hour to get pain meds filled. I called them back, they don't answer half of the time. They told me she's just emotional. I do not recommend.

text:
This specialist is a Master in his craft. I had to have two teeth extracted that were below the gum line. Of course I was scared of complications. Dr Schmidtke assured me there was no problem, true to his word I have had no problems. That was over three years ago. This Dr.
knows what he is doing, I recommend him to everyone.

name: Christopher Senn
text: Great dental surgeon. Most comfortable extraction I have ever experienced.

name: Nicole Hannah
text: Very good experience, he does a great job!!

name: AC Harris

name: Ann G
text: My mother has been here twice in the last month. The staff and Dr. Hassan were both great. We were very pleased with how well the extractions were done.

name: christina pattillo
text: About 6 months ago one side of my wisdom teeth started coming in. The oral surgeon my dentist recommended didn't take my insurance and it was gonna be $4k out of pocket. I looked up oral surgeons around me and found Dr. Hassan and his team. They made me feel very comfortable and a big plus is that even though I paid out of pocket it was still affordable. This month my other wisdom teeth started coming in,so I called them back up got an appointment for a couple days later. Dr. Hassan and his team are very kind, helpful, and they make you feel comfortable with no worries. If I ever need oral surgery again I know exactly who to call and where to go.

text: I decided to visit Dr.Hassan after trying to book an appointment at the oral Surgeon I was referred to couldn't get me in for another few weeks. I also wasn't to impressed with how they were on the phone so I hit Google and saw all the 5 star reviews for Dr.Hassan and boy was I glad I did! They were able to squeeze me in the next day and everyone was amazing from the front staff to the Dr. Himself. Stacy his assistant is just an amazing help. Her and the doctor explained everything and were so comforting.. if your looking for an oral surgeon visit Dr.Hassan you won't be disappointed!

name: Robby Dorsey
text: Had 6 basest teeth Dr Hassan and his nurse.did a expert job.friendly calming.gret job Dr Hassan and staff thank you

name: melissa Davis
text: The visit was the best care and experience  I have ever had from a Dr.’s office. Having a positive and helpful and respectful attitude goes a very long way!!

name: Sarah Foxx
text: Everyone here is very nice, and make you feel very comfortable.  I had two abscesses cut inside my cheek, and the infected tooth pulled.  They made everything comfortable.

name: Mrs Lady
text:
Dr Hassan is great dentist. My family has utilized his facility may times. His staff are very caring and attentive to your needs... This will also be a facility that I would recommend to my family and friends. Because I know this place is TOP NOTCH!!!
Thanks to everyone for taking care of me... I'm very appreciative it well worth the drive to receive great care.

name: Krystin Vasquez
text: I love Dr Hassan's office! He's so good at what he does that even after complicated procedures there's minimal pain and still a quick recovery. I hate that I've had to see him more than once (no one wants to lose teeth) but I'm glad he's around to do the pulling.

name: Kelly Ratcliff
text: Forever grateful for the kind staff.  I can take pain but had a terrible experience from a previous dentist that has me pretty nervous around dentists in general.   Everyone at this office was kind and respected towards me.  I didnt feel a thing other than the novacaine needle and even then they apologized for any pain I might be having and promised it would be over soon. Thank y'all for everything!

name: marie culver
text: Everyone is so amazing! I wouldn't ever go anywhere else!

name: Destinee Briggs
text: Dr. Hassan was super sweet ! And his nurse Mrs. Stacy was also amazing!

name: Amanda's Life
text: Very Very Friendly Staff. First Dentist I went to in this state and it will be the last! This will now be my regular Dentist. They make you feel comfortable and take care of what you need! I will be highly recommending Dr. Hassan !

name: Sharon Pride
text: Dr Hassan is a wonderful & experienced oral surgeon.

name: Danyelle Stanley
text: I had all four of my wisdom teeth taken out on 3/22/21 and by the 23rd, I was moving around with little to no pain. The procedure only took about 45 minutes and they made me feel very comfortable trusting them with this surgery. I am currently on my third day since the surgery and I have yet to have any issues. The incision sites look to be healing very well. I would recommend Shelby Oral Surgery to anyone looking to have wisdom teeth removed.

name: Haley johnson
text: I greatly appreciate the honesty I got from my surgeon during consultation, he sat down and discussed what was best for me and my health rather than just taking my money.

name: Nick Grinolds
text: 10/10 I couldn’t be more pleased. Office staff is friendly and nice. They take the perfect amount of precautions to prevent the spread of COVID 19. I was in and out quickly. I ended up getting dry socket because of my own faults and they took me back in free of charge and helped me twice with no questions ask. I would definitely recommend over and over again.

name: gloria oliver
text: Omg I could not have asked for better service. I'm not a regular patient of theirs but I called them and they seen me the same day. I could not have made it another day with that tooth and I explained that to them. I was in so much pain due to a really bad wisdom tooth that had to be extracted. I have terrible anxiety. They calmed me down and made me feel safe. I dont have insurance and only my husband works and it was affordable for us. I was put to sleep and didn't feel a thing. You guys don't just rock... You guys ROCK ROCK!!!! Definitely me and my husband's new dentist. Did I mention I feel great today....

name: Kayla Riding
text:
The treated me wonderfully!  I got right in (I wasn’t even a patient, I was referred over) they sat me in a room and worked as quickly as possible! They checked my insurance for me to see if I could get a procedure done so I didn’t have to worry about it. They gave me more than just one option and by the time I decided what I wanted done, I was brought back to my room where they had everything set up. They were great during the numbing process, checked on me every 5 minutes or so. Once it was time for the tooth to be pulled it took all of 5 minutes and I was out of there.

10/10 staff and place!

name: nessa d
text: The staff there is wonderful!!

name: Monica
text:
This was my first time having oral surgery, and this office was just out right terrible.
The receptionist was quite rude, and seemed like she had better things to do. The surgeon, Dr Livingston has awful bedside manner, and definitely did not put me at ease. Was very nervous for surgery and not a care in the world from any of the staff members. I do not suggest them, unless you're as cold as they are.

name: jettt111
text: I just got my second implant after they did another one years ago. I wanted a permanent solution for my tooth lost in an accident years ago and I’m so happy. They were right on time , it took 15 minutes. No pain at all. I friendly staff , highly recommend them.

name: Katherine Nelson
text: They always get me in quick and I always come out feeling better. This time around I had 2 teeth extractions and I’m pain free not even tender.

name: Stink Palm
text: They are great,the dentist there are great they took my wisdom tooth out no problem and it was done so good I have no pain the next day. The gave me pain medicine and I don’t even need it.i just want to say thanks cause I was in bad shape.i would definitely recommend this place

name: Aryn Allen
text: I had to have my wisdom teeth removed and an exposure done all at once. I liked the staff but not the experience. My IV stopped working and caused me to wake up in the middle of my surgery, they moved my IV to my other hand. As soon as I woke up after the surgery I was crying because I was traumatized from waking up, and them holding my arm down to replace the IV. My hand was swollen for 2 days after them taking the IV out, clearly they didn’t do it gently.  I would not recommend going to them because, they didn’t call to check on me not once!! My mom figured they would at least call especially since I woke up during the surgery, but they didn’t. This just shows that they don’t care about the well being of their patients. It’s been 23 days since my surgery and I am still in pain!! I have a constant ache and I still cannot open my mouth all the way. I had to call a different office just to ask if that was normal, I got the answer of NO that is not normal. I’m having to go and get second opinions and hopefully some relief.

name: Alan Thompson
text: The staff is all very friendly and the oral surgeon I use there is great.

name: Michelle Austin
text: They were absolutely amazing.

name: The Stuart Yeager
text: Friend of mine goes here. These guys refused to pull a cracked tooth. Friend was in a lot of pain and discomfort. They refused to pull tooth until they recieved payment in full.  Patients care is not a priority. avoid go somewhere else.

name: Rinku Patel
text: Dr. Edverts was amazing! My husband and I both got our wisdom teeth extracted here. I did not feel any pain after my 4 wisdom teeth extraction! I felt more pain when I got my crowns put in! He is amazing, very professional and compassionate. I could tell he loves his job and is very passionate. Would definitely recommend going here for wisdom teeth extraction, you will NOT regret it.

name: Samantha Green
text: Awesome staff they were very friendly and professional, recommend this place to anyone... The surgeon was Great!!! I would definitely come back and/or recommend anyone who needs a oral surgeon.

text:
I took my 10 year old son in. He was very intimated by a pass experience.

text: Very pleasant experience!  Patient care and customer service were both exceptional! Dr. Everts made my family and I feel very at ease about a procedure my young son was scheduled to have.  We were so nervous and to have Dr. Everts and his team treat us with such compassion, surely made a difference.

name: Marilyn Campbell
text: They are caring and supportive, and was a painless experience for me.

name: Adam Wintetbottom
text: I got my wisdom teeth out and I thought It was very fast and so far have had no problems. However the three stars is because I thought the music that was playing was extremely unprofessional.

name: Amber Padilla
text: I can't even say enough about how wonderful my experience here was.....starting w/me calling to make an appointment, cancel it & reschedule w/no problem or attitude.....on the day i arrived, i was greeted as soon as i entered the door by friendly receptionist and beautiful and very clean and comfy waiting room.   After filling out a short form, i was taken back to have another x-ray of my mouth (needed all 4 wisdom teeth removed), and then moved into a room where i watched a short video of procedure i was having and waited briefly for consultation w/my doctor.   i came in contact w/ 2 or 3 techs/staff members other than doc & receptionist, all very sweet, friendly, answered questions, they were all great!   Dr. Livingston comes in, introduces himself w/a smile, explains my xray (wasn't good, my lower wisdom teeth were completely sideways, very deep and hadn't cut through gums), he explained my options, gave me his opinion on my wanting to still be awake the whole time....just advising how invasive it was going to be to make sure i still wanted to remain awake....i loved that he did that, but did not push it or just assume i couldn't handle it, he told me that if i was sure i could get through it, he was confident in going forward.   we went forward w/procedure, he walked me through, talking to me every step of the way, checking on my comfort the entire time.....his tech, Santana i believe, was also great....he was very clear on after care instructions, plus i was given papers explaining after care for next several days, and was told i could call if i had a question or concern of  course.....i don't think i would have felt comfortable being anywhere else or any other doctor.....really helped me to relax while he worked his magic!!!   i recommend to everybody to see these guys, relaxing, happy office....looooved it.....

name: Blakely Powell
text: I called to make an appointment at 8 am, which is when they open and got told that "they don't take calls till 8:15" and then got hung up on by an EXTREMELY rude receptionist. DEFINITELY will not be going here.
