name: Zack Kellis
text:
Dr. Dillard has been my dentist for 23 years.  As a kid, he was famous amongst my sisters and I for his shots that you never feel.

In 1989, I broke 4 of my teeth.  Over the years I continue to break off the bondings then veneers doing a variety of stupid things.  Dr. Dillard has always done great, painless work.  He has TVs hanging from the ceiling so you can watch something while you wait as well.

The staff is great.  I could not reccomend them any higher.

name: J. Terry McCombs
text: Best dental services I have ever received.

resp.text: Thanks Terry!

name: Elizabeth Foster
text: Dr Dillard and his staff are the absolute BEST.

resp.text: Thank you Elizabeth!

name: amy baird
text: Dr. Dillard gave me my smile back! .Thank you to his staff. They are the best.

name: Anne Orchard
text:
This place called me and informed me that Dr. Dillard is now accepting BCBS insurance so I make an appointment to have a few fillings.
Dr. Dillard was NOT the dentist they gave me. I was treated to Dr. DeShazo from MS.
She was in a hurry and botched the whole procedure terribly. After the Novocain wore off my bite was uneven. I called and went back the next day and they tried to grind it back to normal. Still, a week later Im in pain and my bite is worse.
The recommended Advil.
Awesome.
I will not be back. I will find another dentist.

name: denise jeffries
text: Simply the best!

name: Bob Cleveland
text: He has been my dentist for 30 years.  'Nuf said ?

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. Cleveland!

name: Matt Besecker
text: Best dentist and dental hygienists in the area!

resp.text: Thanks Matt! We enjoy having you as a patient and greatly appreciate your business.

name: Chris Lanter
text: Very fun, friendly,  and outgoing staff that does a great job

resp.text: Thank you!

name: elizabeth haynes
text: Dr. Dillard & all the staff are always wonderful!!

resp.text: Thanks Libba!

name: Ken Suda
text: Pain-free baby!

resp.text: WooHoo!!! That's what we like to hear! Thank you for your feedback.

name: Roy Connell
text: Caring, excellence, and friendly service

name: Angel Ellison
text: I went in for a consultation with Dr. Matthew Johnson. From beginning to end everyone was great. The atmosphere is warm, caring & relaxing. Everything was explained as it was being done. Dr. Johnson was very nice, really put me at ease about my situation. They have a wonderful staff which can make or break a practice regardless of what the doctors do. I could feel very comfortable referring them. HATS off to everyone. 😎😎😎

name: Marty Arant
text: A complete NothingBurger.  No discomfort,  pain or swelling afterwards.  They even gave me the tooth they removed to make way for the implant.  Now I have a nifty ornament for my Crocodile Dundee hat :-)

name: Lisa Busler
text:
I saw Dr Matthew Johnson for a consultation referral to have upper teeth removed for dentures. First let me say this is a beautiful modern facility that provides a relaxed environment ( in case there are Nervous folks out there).
From the moment I entered I was greeted with smiles and very efficient procedures. Each team member from technicians up to the Dr. we’re great at explaining what was happening and options to accommodate me (I am in a wheelchair so getting X-rays was a challenge. ). They have coordinated with my dentist who is doing the denture fitting, which is a relief!
I will be returning for the procedure soon and feel very confident about the care I’ll be given!
I appreciate the referral that this practice!

name: VR Zamora
text:
I've been a repeat costumer for multiple surgeries and every time their staff's service and car have always been First Class! My youngest son was also a patient and always received the same level of care A+! Dr. Johnson and his dental removed my 40+ post without feeling any discomfort nor pain during the procedure. They always do AMAZING WORK! Audrey, my intake representative, was very pleasant and courteous.
Thank you very much once again!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words.

name: Kim Whitfield
text: Dr. Parker and his whole crew are awesome. Very thorough. Very helpful. You wont be in better hands. You can tell Dr. Parker and his crew care about your situation and take outstanding care of you... I am truly thankful for their services today. Fixing my regular dentist's mistake very well... God Bless these fine folks @ Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery Associates

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Ms. Whitfield.

name: Larissa Hornsby
text: I haven't gotten the chance to say goodbye to the doctors (I don't think) but thank you so very much for having me as your patient. It gives me peace of mind to have extremely friendly professionals work on and care for me and the surgery wasn't near as bad as I expected at all! It's such a relief having this done and you guys truly are a blessing.

name: David Eady
text:
Kathy Eady - author
Love Dr. Kean and his staff, both nurses and office staff. Professional, friendly, and helpful. I recently had an implant done and the procedures involved were carried out in a professional and caring manner. I would definitely recommend this office. Will use again if the need arose.

name: Jackie Weaver
text: The overall experience with the doctor was good, I’m just bothered by the fact that they scheduled me for 10:30, tell me to be there early... I’m there at 10:11, and I’m told my appointment is at 11??  My time is as precious as theirs and it should be respected, I could have planned better if I was told differently. May not seem like a lot difference, but it is to me. Respect my time.

name: Velida Davis
text:
I love the staff and Dr. Parker. The staff where very professional, but yet they seem like your best friends. I have never experienced this level of kindness at any doctor's office with their staff.
I would like to thank Dr. Park and his staff for their understanding and how very grateful of his kindness and skills. God bless him and his staff.

name: Jessica Beasley
text: Dr.Parker and his team are amazing friendly!!   Love it that Dr Parker himself calls day after surgery to check up on you.  Toni Jarrett is very clear explaining all procedures and cost and she’s very polite and very nice.  All smiles in this office.

name: Ali C
text: First off, this place and the people are extremely professional and polite. Big shout out to Debbie, Barbara, Nika, Marley, Dr. Parker and fellow Halloween lover Ashton. Megan was a natural on her first day! I had to get all four wisdom teeth extracted and they did an outstanding job EVERY step of the way. I have a fear of the needle puncturing my skin and they handled me with precision and accuracy, plus they numbed my injection site before giving the IV. My procedure only took 30 minutes and then I was rolled out to my driver/ best friends. It honestly could not have gone any better and I'm just extremely grateful for everyone that had a hand in this. Thank you all for being so amazing!!! I know that sometimes always doing your best and what's right may seem like no one cares, but for the people like me that pay attention, you all matter and are so important. Thank you truly for everything between the conversations to the gentle care given. It matters and the love for what you do shows for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Ali.

name: Anna Faye
text: I just went to the office in Prattville for a consultation about wisdom teeth surgery. The staff and doctor were extremely nice and thorough. I have been told I will be having my surgery in the hospital due to my medical conditions. That made me know that the doctor prioritizes my safety. Hopefully my surgery goes well! I definitely recommend this place.

name: Aliah Brown
text: I absolutely love me some Dr. Parker &'d his staff...😊 I had wisdom teeth pulled today &'d I feel great...no pain at all! They are so caring!! I even called after my surgery to thank him!!

name: Tracy Nicole Fisher
text: I had 8 teeth pulled. Dr. Parker and his staff were great! Very kind, very efficient. I would recommend this office to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you very much.

name: Freya Renee
text:
The staff was amazing, very polite. However, for whatever reason they did not run my insurance before I went back and I ended up paying out of pocket just to be told I cannot use my insurance until January.
I would have cancelled the appointment had I known. I would have never agreed to pay almost $70 for a 5 minute chit chat.
I just found it a bit odd that they kept my insurance card and id until the end of my appointment and then hit me with the “self pay” after everything was over.
Don’t self pay patients pay before hand?
It just sits wrong with me.

name: Laurice Goorley
text: Professional staff. Incredible service. Highly recommend this surgical team.

name: Sapphire Washington
text: It's always a pleasure dealing with the staff here. They are very detailed, attentive and provide quick service. I had a tooth extracted in the past and had no complications after whatsoever.

name: Amy Kearley
text: Awesome experience!! This team made wisdom teeth extraction a breeze! Everyone is super warm and friendly...professional and timely! Highly recommend!

name: Reagan Smith
text: Got all 4 of my wisdom teeth removed by Dr. Johnson, he was a nice man and his nurses were nice and comforting. It was as smooth of a surgery you can ask for.

resp.text: Thanks Reagan.

name: Aimee Ordung
text: Absolutely amazing! In and out, didn’t even know I was under, lol. Highly recommend! And will def use again

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words and we are glad that your visit was successful.

name: Manisha Patel
text: I’d read a review that referred to O & M as a “well-oiled machine,” and in my experience, that is an accurate description.  Every staff member I came into contact with during consultation visit and actual procedure was competent, efficient, and left no time for me (someone who was already nervous) to feel any anxiety.  Dr. Johnson was calm and confident which made me feel the same way.  The facility is clean, I appreciated the Covid-protocols and overall I would rate the experience a 10/10.

name: janice hancock
text: We were met by a friendly nurse to do the Covid check-in and made to feel comfortable and secure about our safety by procedures in place. The admin was efficient and kind- very professional.  The nurses in the surgery room were professional, efficient, and kind and took great care of me.  Dr. Johnson was friendly and his consistent demeanor of confidence and calm always provide a great surgical environment. I am happy and satisfied with the entire experience!  Thanks again for the great care!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words and we are glad that your surgery went great.

name: Terri E Bischoff
text:
Clean, well lit and wonderful staff. I was treated respectfully and reassured that the bump I had on my gums was treatable. I went in nervous and embarrassed, I came out reassured and comfortable.

I'd give them more ⭐'s if I could.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words.

name: Freedom Reigns
text: The first thing I noticed about the office staff was how efficiently they operated, like a well oiled machine. The second thing I noticed was how clean Dr Parker’s room was, even the corners of the floor were spotless! Cleanliness in a physician’s office speaks volumes to me. Dr Parker was thorough and didn’t rush through my appointment. And his assistant, Neika, was friendly and made sure we understood everything the following appointment would entail. It was a good experience.

name: Family J
text: Consultation was fast but we already new they needed to come out..Scheduling the surgery was easy to schedule when we wanted it..The desk ladies were all nice and easy to talk to. Surgery day was a easy check-in and Covid safe. They let us know everything we needed to know before the patient came out so we could leave as soon as they were done. Which was nice..When they woke up they let us know that all the nurses were so nice and played great music they liked and talked about things they liked which they said made them feel more comfortable. We had every med we would need to make healing go easy and painless. Healing took about a week to fully feel normal again. If we have to go thru this surgery again, we would definitely use them again and recommend them

name: Haley Plato
text: Dr. Parker and his staff were very nice during the process. He made sure I understood everything that was going to happen during my surgery . If you are looking for an Oral Surgeon. I highly recommend Dr. J.J. Parker. He is the best !

name: Jessica Lee
text: Dr Parker is the best! The entire staff is amazing!!!

name: Andy Layne
text: I had a tooth on the upper left extracted. I told the nurse I have a good vein in my Left AC, she found it quickly and before I knew it I was walking up post procedure.  I had an adverse reaction to Lortab after getting my wisdom teeth out many years ago.  The other nurse asked me about other meds. I've never had any other procedures so no need for pain meds, so I said I had not had them.  I was sent home with 800 mg Ibuprofen which is like popping tic tacs. OTC Ibupropren has never worked for my dental pain and this is just as useless.  Other than the pain meds which don't really help at all everything else was great.  The woman who came out to ask the questions, the ladies at the front desk,  the ladies over billing, the nurses, and doctor were all super nice. It's barely noticeable I have a tooth missing.

name: Hope Langley
text: Dr. Kean is a great Oral Surgeon. He has such a kind and professional mannerism. He takes time to explain the procedure and is very attentive to his patients. I highly recommend him, as he has been the one I have trusted to take care of my family.

name: Priscilla Beasley
text: The staff was very accommodating, friendly and professional. Dr. Johnson was extremely thorough during our consultation. I would highly recommend their service.

name: dorthy powell
text: I would recommend this service to anyone needing it. The office visit was very pleasant and the Doctor and nursing  staff making you feel at ease through the entire process. My surgery was this morning and it's been 8 hours and no pain or problems.

name: Brittany Mcconico
text:
Just amazing I knew everything was going to be fine especially with the faith I have!
Very quick and friendly ❤️

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Brittany.

name: Kaylee Garner
text: I was nervous and scared, but everyone there was nice and helped to calm me down and get my mind off things I have had slight to no pain after wisdom teeth extraction.

name: Angela Upshaw
text: Went here several years ago for a bulge on my son’s gum. Dr Parker advised us he had extra teeth which caused the bulge. Dr Parker seemed like a nice enough doctor, even called to check up after my son’s procedure.  Years later, not only was the bulge still there, but we found out my son did not have extra teeth and Dr Parker had pulled his permanent teeth. It wasn’t until we went to another oral surgeon that we found out the real problem. Now my son is missing 2 teeth that’s cost us and will continue cost us until he’s old enough to get implants. Yes, we went back and was brushed off by Dr. Parker.

name: Rex McClellan
text: They are wonderful, the entire experience, when you aren't very comfortable with dental work, was excellent! Dr.Parker was wonderful even calling me the next day to check on me to see how I was doing!

name: Lady Gamer
text: I went in for a consolt and they did x rays even though my dr already did them they charged me 70 dollars for that when it wasn't needed since my dentist referred me and all they needed was to request the xrays from my dentist. Then wanted to charge me over 500 after insurance for a wisdom tooth extraction that wasn't near the nerve or impacted. They also refused local anesthesia and wanted to sedate me even though I expressed I do NOT want to be sedated due to having previously having brain surgery and I am too scared to be sedated. He told me that is the ONLY option. Also he said while I was sedated they would have to crank my jaw open since I could only open it 2 fingers width wide since brain surgery. He told me he doesn't know why I cant open it wide and told me go see an oral surgeon at the uab hospital. My appointment was the day I got back from driving for 13 hours due to family emergency and I was told I would only have to pay a cancelation fee if I scheduled another appointment. Well they lied and reported it to credit and added on a 90 dollar cancelation fee when I called and canceled and had no intentions on rescheduling with a dentist who charges so much and refuses to do local anesthesia. Worst experience I have ever had with an oral surgeon! Not friendly not understanding not willing to follow patients wishes! I went to a different oral surgeon and paid less than 200 for the extraction no cranking my jaw open and local anesthesia only! Do not go here!

name: v.m. arrington
text: Dr. Parker, Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery Associate and staff was amazing!

name: Cheryl Calhoun
text: From the moment I entered the office I felt welcomed.  Such friendly and loving staff. Dr. Johnson explained the procedure and that really put my mind at ease. Thanks

name: Deroithy “Cool Breeze” Scott
text: Awesome Doctor and great staff.

name: Von Foster
text: Visited OMS today. My experience was great. Doctor and staff were wonderful.

name: Ansley Russell
text: Dr. Kean is phenomenal!! I highly recommend him! He cares about his patients and he definitely knows what he is doing! Also all other staff are very nice as well!!

name: Hannah S
text: The patient experience was clearly not a priority at this organization. My consultation with Dr. Parker lasted maybe one minute, leaving me more nervous than I previously was to get my wisdom teeth removed. This was my first time ever being put under for a procedure, so the lack of connection and trust I felt with the doctor did not sit well with me. My other complaint is in regards to how I was treated on procedure day. First, my wait time was astronomical: probably 3-4 hours, which is a horrendous wait prior to a fasted procedure. When I was woken up post-procedure, I was basically yanked out of my chair as soon as I could open my eyes. Due to the meds, I couldn’t walk at all and was dragged to my car by two nurses on either side of me, catching me as I fell. It would have been nice to have been given 5-10 minutes to wake up and regain consciousness before being forced to walk. It made me feel like this place prioritizes being a wisdom tooth factory rather than caring for their patients. I am giving two stars because medically speaking I had no complications and had a nice recovery.

name: Beanie Turner
text: Very caring and simply wonderful group that Dr Parker has working with him! I was told by the nurse if I had any problems after surgery to call or message anytime! We had problems and my son was in a lot of pain so I messaged the nurse on a Wednesday night and she was caring and sympathetic and called me as soon as she got to work to get us in that day when they were already swamped! When we got there Dr Parker removes a sharp piece of bone that had embedded in his gum, my son had immediate relief and saved us from having another surgery. Dr Parker even called the day after surgery himself to check on my son which is unheard of these days. Until you see your child suffering in pain and can’t eat or drink or sleep you wish you could be the one enduring that pain and you become desperate to get them help and this group cared about him just like I do!

name: Monquinta Harris
text:
The place was nice and clean. Temperature was taken at the door and given hand sanitizer. Wait time was 30 minutes. I like how fast I was given an appt for my surgery. My consultation was on a Tuesday and surgery on Thursday.
Update: I had my surgery Thursday to remove 3 wisdom teeth and Dr Parker is amazing as well as his staff. It was well worth the money going to an oral surgeon and not your regular dentist. My regular dentist remove one wisdom tooth and it was torture. My face was swollen for 2 weeks. With dr Parker, I have minimal swelling and not in pain due to taking my pain meds.

name: Mohammad Alam
text: From check in to check out, one word EXCEPTIONAL! Thank you Dr Johnson and the entire team! Highly recommend!

name: Zatie
text: I came to this office when it was off Vaughn road a while back to get my wisdom teeth removed and it was impeccable service! I came here today at the new beautiful location off halcyon to get a tooth extraction and I must say the the service and the actually surgery was impeccable once again! The staff and is so nice and sweet and definitely recommend this business for your oral and Maxillofacial needs!

name: Maliha Islam
text: I had my wisdom teeth removed from here last year. I didn't like this place because the consultation was just me watching a video (which I can kind of understand. There's no need to have a person explain the process). After that, the dentist came in, gave me the TINIEST grin, then proceeded to talk at 2x speed for a total of 15 seconds before leaving the room. He came off very cold and rude. I've never been scared of any dentist even as a kid until that moment. The only good thing I can say is that the procedure was quick, and I recovered quickly without having to use any of the prescribed opioids, so that's why I'm giving 3 stars.

name: Alicia Parzynski
text: I was soo scared to have surgery mainly because ive never had it. But it was actually really good and i had the best sleep ever.

name: Cathy Desselle
text: I LOVE this office, very on top of things with the virus situation very clean nice classy office very nice polite amazing surgeon

name: Alicia Parzynski
text: I was soo scared to have surgery mainly because ive never had it. But it was actually really good and i had the best sleep ever.

name: Courtney Laister
text: This will be my second surgery, The team here is so professional and amazing. I would definitely recommend them.

name: Mia James
text: Dr and staff were competent and friendly.

name: Meshell Glass
text: Excellent. Facility bright inviting. Every one friendly helpful

name: Makhari Waller-McCary
text: Super friendly staff. My first visit was today and it went very well.

name: katerra hampleton
text: Got my wisdom teeth out and I was in and out in like 30 minutes if that !!!! Fast, clean, and super friendly! I have no pain either. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

name: Stephanie Bone
text: Very professional and friendly. Quick procedure (all wisdom teeth removed at once) very little pain the next day. They are very clean. If I ever need another procedure done I will be coming back. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words.

name: Keyarrow Moore
text: I was referred here but I felt very rushed and didn't feel like the procedure was explained fully. I felt like I wasn't given many options at all from payment to scheduling. Kind of disappointed because I've had to wait two weeks for a procedure and then deal with attitude.

name: Denise Jarrett Norcross
text: My daughter needed her wisdom teeth removed - our dentist recommended Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery Associates. We saw Dr. Parker at the Prattville office and have been very pleased. We will return there for sure as the need arises! Office staff very nice & professional. Everything explained in precise detail.

name: Sonya Floyd
text: Dr. Johnson and his team were great. Very professional and efficient.

name: BriannaIman TV
text: Not the best experience and bad customer service. I went for a wisdom teeth consultation. After my X-Rays, they placed me in a room to watch a video and wait for the doctor. After the 9 minute video I literally was left waiting in the room for over an hour and when Dr.Parker finally comes in all he does is take a mirror and looks at my wisdom teeth and the appointment is over. After the very short meeting we are then led to the payment station where we were met with a very sassy rude worker. When scheduling an appointment here you might want to bring a fully charged phone and some snacks because your going to be waiting for a while.

name: BS Outdoors
text: 11/10 recommend these people. Very friendly staff and very quick and easy operation. I don’t remember, nor did I feel a thing. The recovery has been painless so far as well! To say the least, if I need any addition oral surgery, I will definitely be coming here.

name: Anthony Waters
text: They waited to the day of my appointment that I scheduled weeks in advance to notify me that my wisdom teeth consultation is being rescheduled to a month and half later. I took off that day which was hard to do for that day. I feel like they pick and choose who they wanted to reschedule. Not to pull the race card but why me and I asked how did they come to the conclusion of who to reschedule and no one could give me a answer. They are unprofessional and some racist people there and they don't care about what you need done but only what is convienence for them. I wish I could give no stars

name: Marleshia Safford
text: I had my bottom teeth pulled out first 2months ago and got my top two wisdom teeth out today! I didn’t feel nothing at all !! Dr Johnson is the best! I would recommend him to anybody!! Yess!

name: The History Buff
text: Dr. Johnson and his staff were first class toward me from start to finish. If I ever needed another tooth pulled, he's the guy I'd go to.

name: Carl Bledsoe
text: These folks are very caring and work together as a great team. Everthing about this experience was great!

name: Sandra Barner
text: Staff was very friendly, the doctor was very thorough with the details involving the X-rays and the surgery.

name: Daborah Evans
text: It was a really good experience. I was terrified but they made me feel really comfortable and it was over so quickly. Everyone was really nice. Would definitely refer them to anyone I know.

name: Angie Hicks
text:
Dr. Kean is the most caring and kindhearted oral surgeon I've ever met
He truly cares about his patients. What he's doing for me is truly amazing.  Thank you Dr. Kean and your amazing staff.

name: Angie Hicks
text:
Dr. Kean is the most caring and kindhearted oral surgeon I've ever met
He truly cares about his patients. What he's doing for me is truly amazing.  Thank you Dr. Kean and your amazing staff.

name: Carol Roberts
text: This is an excellent surgical center. They were quick and efficient. The lady at the desk and the nurse weren't particularly friendly but they were polite and got the job done. There was no confusion over the procedure, payment or after care. The doctor was wonderful. The entire procedure (wisdom teeth) was over in 15 minutes.

name: Sandra Godwin
text: Very professional group and doctor.

name: Brittnie Whitt
text:
I was referred by another dentist (due to COVID 19, all other dentists are apparently closed) and was put through to Dr Parkers office. My mother has had a horrible tooth infection and was set for extraction via her regular dentist but with the pandemic her appointment has been rescheduled over and over. She has been to the emergency room twice for antibiotics because the infection is so bad she cant move her jaw or get out of bed. Not only did the office representative hang up on me after giving me the most pathetic excuse for proffesionalism she insisted that the only option was to pay 900 dollars or risk the infection getting worse. I asked if there was anything else she could inform me to do and she literally got so frustrated she hung up in my face. What I know is how you treat people in the most need especially during a time like this says more about your moral compass and character than anything else will.
Just my advice but go somewhere else or you run the risk of being swept under the rug as a deplorable.

name: GIG Terry J Sayles Sr.
text: I had the most wonderful experience and this was my consultation appointment. The entire staff showed total professionalism as well as provided a very welcoming atmosphere! I'm truly looking forward to my next visit. From the bottom to the top of my heart I already love you guys. Please don't ever change unless it's getting better at what you're already great at. 100% SATISFACTION IS HOW I FEEL!!!

name: ReNina Fields
text: The staff was very nice and pleasant. The atmosphere was very inviting. I didn't have to wait a long time to be taken care of: from check in to getting my copayment done to going back for surgery, all went by swiftly. And my procedure was a success. I would recommend them to anyone to take care of their oral surgery needs.

name: Tonya Catrett
text: Staff was extremely helpful and friendly.  They took good care of the girls.

name: Angela Caldwell
text: Today was my first time at this location with my son, the staff was awesome..

name: R P
text: An evaluation here led me to a treatment plan costing 15k. The exact same treatment plan from UAB? 4k. That's all some of you need to know. I'm sure they do great work here but that's not always the deciding factor.

name: Allen Sanford
text: I have used Dr. Kean and his wonderful staff since a major traumatic injury in 1996. I myself a medical  professional  have never experienced a more professional office ,staff,nurses and physicians.In a day of new medicine it is rare to find a group of people with such a personal touch.They listen,explain and make themselves available 24/7.They have taken the same care with my family members as well as those I refer.Montgomery medicine could take a lesson from this group.I could go on for days about good reviews but as we say in the south,"nuff said".

name: R P
text: An evaluation here led me to a treatment plan costing 15k. The exact same treatment plan from UAB? 4k. That's all some of you need to know. I'm sure they do great work here but that's not always the deciding factor.

name: Gloria Black
text: Quick appointment, knowledgeable staff regarding insurance filings, coverage, etc. Saw Dr. Johnson and after a thorough exam, I was relieved to be told there was nothing to worry about. I would recommend this doctor and facility to anyone.

name: Shelly Marie
text: Friendly staff and clean facility. Would benefit from more extensive after care instruction, such as what to expect and when to worry. When I called several days after surgery, due to a concern with my wound site, I did not feel that my concerns were addressed properly. I ended up going to see my regular dentist that same day to evaluate and treat my wound site in which my gums were extremely inflamed around my surgical site/stitches causing quite a bit of discomfort. I felt rushed through the day of my procedure. I will be seeking care elsewhere for my dental implant procedure due to the feeling of being just a number with this group.

name: Allen Sanford
text: I have used Dr. Kean and his wonderful staff since a major traumatic injury in 1996. I myself a medical  professional  have never experienced a more professional office ,staff,nurses and physicians.In a day of new medicine it is rare to find a group of people with such a personal touch.They listen,explain and make themselves available 24/7.They have taken the same care with my family members as well as those I refer.Montgomery medicine could take a lesson from this group.I could go on for days about good reviews but as we say in the south,"nuff said".

name: Margaret Eagerton
text: The BEST staff in every way.. Highly recommend this office!!

name: Brandy Frazier
text: Very friendly and understanding staff. Looking forward my next visit.

name: Dennis Unger
text: Very clear with the information and billing.  Very little pain after having Wisdom Teeth removed, back at work the next day. The Staff is fantastic!

name: Asemeri Moody
text: I can’t remember much but they’re very friendly and made me feel very comfortable

name: No Name
text: The nurses didn’t make my daughter feel comfortable. My daughter was panicking and the nurses were laughing and I didn’t appreciate it. Also the staff needs to communicate properly with the patient and family about the  procedure.

name: Melanie Bentley
text: Very friendly and professional staff. I was seen on time for me appointment and all my questions and concerns were addressed.  I highly recommend  Dr. Kean and his staff.

name: Jeff Traver
text: Great customer service! They truly care about their patients.

name: Julie Coker
text: I just want to say that the entire staff and Dr. Parker are wonderful. I had a tooth pulled today and it was very pleasant experience. I will continue to go to Dr. Parker for any future Dental needs. Thank you!

name: V T
text: Dr M. Johnson and staff are wonderful!   They got me in and out so quickly!  I will highly recommend this place.

name: R&J seejohn
text:
Staff is super friendly however the word appointment is taken VERY LOOSELY. count on a minimum of 2 hours even if you see your dr for 5 min.

Dr. Wall really knows what he's doing, I didn't feel a thing and haven't had any pain since. Highly recommended dentist. Nice staff, and the Dr. Knows what he's doing.

name: minnie killen
text:
I went to this dentist close when they first opened up.
They really really damaged my mouth.
They said they did 3 fillings but really did four... Not only that but they drilled to far and unfortunately i had to have all of them pulled. I had 3 surgeries trying to correct their mistake before we just had them pulled. i did try to reach out to them but when i called expressing something was wrong the lady in the front wouldnt listen and instead said they would look at it but in a month and said we needed to try and get the others. I had to then switch dentists and since then im terrified to even attempt to get something as small as a filling.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review. Very sorry your experience wasn’t what you’d hoped. Our team will look into this.

name: Starr Lehner
text:
While I was saying wrong tooth she kept pulling stating she'll get it. I asked why won't it come out. She stated she'll get it.
So she pulled the good tooth and left decayed abcessed tooth beside it.
Wouldn't let me see tooth she pulled.
Had to go to another dentist who very easily pulled decayed tooth. He asked why she pulled wrong tooth.
When partial I've had more than 30 yrs wouldn't fit back I stated maybe because when you pulled tooth the others moved. Oh no that didn't happen. So she grinded on my partial making it for first time ever loose.
Well went back to get partial and they added a metal loop and wrapped it around another decayed tooth. Recently found out (from Dr)acid reflux quickly ruined my teeth. Always was complimented on my teeth and the care I took. So of course it broke off completely.
Of course Signature Smile wants their co-pay money. I sent what I could. Still I suffer. No apology.
Since the ordeal I've dealt with parotid gland pain.
I'm sure because I'm poor and on Medicare (cancer) I just don't meet their standard of a wealthy christian person so it doesn't matter. Wish I could post pictures of my mouth and what I live with because of them.

resp.text:
Starr,

We have tried contacting you directly regarding your review. Our records regarding the visits you mentioned are from 2017 and 2018, and we have documented consents for the treatment you requested. You also have recurring visits for comprehensive care after the treatment was completed, with no complaints or regard for any issues you mentioned in your review. We are happy to discuss this with you further. Our main priority is to give patients high quality care for their dental health and needs. We hope to hear from you soon!

Signature Smile

name: Chris K. Northington
text: I can not say enough good things about Dr. Wilson and his staff at Signature Smile.  They are without a doubt the best Dental practice I have ever been to.  We turned to them to fix my wife's implants/crowns when no-one else in the area could make them look right.  From the moment we walked in the door, we were greeting with compassion and understanding, and assured that they could fix her crowns.  They immediately scheduled an appoint for that same week to do her evaluation.  In that first appointment, Dr. Wilson laid out exactly what needed to be done, gave us a time frame for the work to be completed with cost estimates, and hand made her a set of temporaries that looked better than any of the final crowns from the other dentists we had worked with.  He performed laser dentistry on her gums to give her a bigger smile, used the KOR whitening system to give her a bright white color to her teeth, and put on two new crowns that he gets from a lab in Hollywood, CA.  I can proudly say today that my wife has a beautiful smile that she is so proud of thanks to the work of Dr. Wilson and his staff at Signature Smiles.  They are now offering laser filings that can be done with no numbing or drilling.  If you are a new patient, they offer a free Smile Evaluation that includes a panoramic X-ray.  I have referred many customers to them because of my belief in the work they do.

name: L “lalani wuto” M
text: I have had several occasions to visit Dr. Wilson's dental practice.  I have not ever had less than a wonderful experience.  From cleaning to root canal services, I have had comfortable, painless, and easy sessions with Dr. Wilson and the staff.  He utilizes the latest technology including laser, easy and non invasive X-Ray sessions, and new ways of imagery when viewing bone structure.  I want to also send accolades to the front reception area as well.  The associates are so very friendly and helpful.  They were a great help with my insurance questions and very helpful on every thing I needed as far as administrative information.  I have never had to wait too long for my appointments and felt like I was always visiting family.

text: I was impressed with the overall set up of the place.  I liked how they explained my overall situation, and how they were neither judgemental or condescending

name: Mary Robinson
text:
I recently won a Sheer Whitening Gift Certificate at Blue valued at $149. I scheduled my appointment with the dental rep and asked what I could expect. She told me to plan to be there about an hour. They would clean, polish and then give me the Sheer Whitening treatments. Wow, I thought, pretty good prize. I proceeded to ask what kind of whitening treatments they used, 5 day strips, ugh, I thought, oh well.

Unfortunately, I arrived for my appointment about 10 minutes late, however, not intentional. The receptionist was a bit unfriendly and I thought maybe it was because I was late. Shortly, a dental assistant came to me with a clip board and 5 pages to fill out. I completed my basic information and soon realized they were wanting more info than was totally necessary to claim a prize. I began scanning over the pages and stopped immediately. They were asking me everything from signing to consent to pay for the charges they would render to me today and insurance could not be filed to authorizing them to obtain my dental records from my current dentist. I proceeded to the receptionist and told her there was obviously a mistake, I was asked to fill out patient paperwork and that I was only there to redeem my gift certificate. She told me to proceed completing the paperwork so that they could keep it on file. I looked at her in disbelief and sat back down placing the pen under the clip. I guess she signaled the assistant who came out and retrieved my paperwork. I waited for over 30 minutes before they called me back. I followed the assistant back to a dental room and she handed me a box of strips and about 5 minutes of instruction. Do you have any questions? I said, "Are we done?", she said yes that's it. Hmm, so they led me to believe that the cleaning and polishing were part of my prize when really they were going to bill me for this when they were finished. I guess I didn't fall for their trap. Talk about deceitful, a good reputable business does not do business this way. I will not be back. I will still use my strips, but could have got them at Wal-mart for $12.00. What a joke. Watch out?

name: Shelby Davis
text: Dr. Yarnell is an awesome dentist. The office staff is very friendly. Very clean and welcoming environment. I appreciate the staff for taking such good care of my dental needs!

This team is very patient, kind, understanding and much more! What I thought I couldn’t do- I am now comfortable knowing I can go to them and know I will be taken well care of. Would and will highly recommend this team in the Helena location!!

text: Wonderful staff and so friendly at the Northcutt Dental located in Helena! I typically dread going to the dentist but everyone made sure I was comfortable. Definitely recommend this dental practice!!

name: Angel Tillman
text: I really wanted to like this dentist's office.  It's very efficient and clean.  The work is done promptly.  I did not care for the first hygienist I had, so I asked to have her replaced.  The second was much better and the third hygienist was the best I've ever had.  However, when I first switched to Northcutt, it was because my previous dentist retired.  I was told that a filling I had received needed to be replaced.  I was reluctant, because it wasn't giving me any pain or problems, but I had it replaced.  After the replacement, the dentist said he needed to replace his own work (no charge)  so he did.  Then I started having a lot of pain from the 2nd replacement.  He worked on it a 3rd time.  The last time I went in, he expressed that the whole tooth needed to be crowned - lest I eventually need a full root canal.  (this time charged of course)  Needless to say, I will have to be getting a second opinion.  I cannot have the same tooth worked on 5 times unless it truly is necessary.

text: Today was my first time to go to Northcutt Dental office. From the moment I walked in the door I felt welcomed the staff were so nice. My Family and I won't be going anywhere else but there. Thank you for all the information and wonderful experience.

name: Tammy
text: Everyone was nice and they were all very professional and the work I had to have done was excellent!

name: William Shannan Seelmann
text: The admin staff is friendly and the office is nice and clean. The porcelain crown I had done less than a year ago not only came off tonight but it also has a hole all the way through it. The assistant who adjusted it before it was cemented did not listen to anything I said when she was fitting and drilling on it. I told her the contacts were too tight, but she insisted on adjusting the occlusal (biting surface) until here we are less than a year later with a useless crown. Since we've already moved from Helena, I can't even get Northcutt Dental to make this right. Insurance only pays for 1 crown per tooth every 5 years... I would not recommend this place!

resp.text: I want to thank you for talking with us to discuss your issue. It is our goal to make sure our patients are raving fans of NDP and we want to do all that we can to address your needs upfront. We are sorry that you had this experience and hope you were pleased with our quick response & solution to your concern.

text: They are the best   informative, high tech, fun and knowledgable.  The staff rocks from front to back.

name: Zahir Merchant
text:
Stay away if you value your money.

They quoted me $17k for my dental work, went somewhere else (which had to redo my x-rays for free because the Northcutt ones were so poor in quality) and they quoted me for around $4k without my insurance, just around $1.5k with it.

The red flag for me to get a second opinion was when they kept pushing a $15 enamel toothpaste. If you look it up on Amazon, you can get the exact same toothpaste in a two pack for the same price.

If a dental office is willing to sell you toothpaste with a 100% markup, you have to imagine what else they're taking advantage of you on.

To be fair, the staff is friendly, and the office is very very nice with games for kids.

But this price gouging is ridiculous, and I think someone has to acknowledge it.

text: Deerfoot dental come highly recommended by several people. The staff was kind and charismatic enough to put me at ease while still being professional. My only complaints were they only offered the white fillings when several insurance companies will only pay for silver, while I personally prefer the while on visible teeth I know some people can not afford to pay the difference. My second complaint which is really minuscule was I had a little trouble finding the building with it being behind the pediatrician's office and in the same parking lot without a sign at each parking  lot entrance. The problem was solved with a quick call to clarify their location when I got close.

name: Celena Hathaway
text: My husband, B, had the most amazing experience here! I know...I know...you’re thinking, “How can anyone have an amazing experience at the dentist?” Well, let me tell you. He had a pretty rough time, my husband. He was in a real bad way when he arrived there, and Dr. G did not mince his words. He (probably) said, “Yeah, my man...you’re gunna lose that tooth.” Now, my B was in immense pain and seriously considering pulling his own tooth with a pair of dirty garage pliers. Dr. G (probably) said, “Nay, sir. There’s no need for that. Take these antibiotics, and I’ll see you on Monday to exorcise that evil spiritual entity from your mandible.” Brian was henceforth treated with the absolute best dental care that he’s ever received, and we, as a family, will (not probably—definitely) be forever clients at Deerfoot Dental!

I felt very comfortable immediately.  I found the Staff to be very friendly and helpful in answering my questions?
The Dental Assistant was extremely efficient and explained to me the duties she was performing. This was important to me who wants to know what is being done in my mouth!
I immediately felt confident that Dr. Grovenstein would be candid in diagnosing the problem to keep my teeth healthy.
I have an appointment June 4th for a huge cavity under a crown that he said could possibly call for a root canal.  My initial appointment was yesterday (May 23) and ironically the crown came out today.

name: Angela Cross
text:
I'll leave my original review below because it still stands however I’d like to update to say while everyone is very nice there you should stay on top of your own benefits and find out ahead of time how much every single thing they do will cost you and then call your insurance yourself and verify that it will be covered (probably a good practice anyway obviously but I just assumed they were on top of it since I was only initially charged a copay only to find out a month later that so much work was done (in a couple of appointments) in an overlapping way that my benefits we're maxed out and they still continued to do more work after that that I wasn't aware wouldn't be covered so I now have a massive bill from them that I definitely didn't see coming. Like I said probably my own fault for trusting someone else to have my best interest in mind and to be on top of something like that but lesson very painfully learned.)

Original review

I have terrible dental anxiety but everyone at Deerfoot Dental has gone above and beyond to help ease that. I highly recommend Deerfoot Dental especially to those who are generally nervous about visiting the dentist. The team here from the girl doing your billing and appointments to the nurses and doctor are all genuinely warm and kind. No long waits and they get you scheduled quickly and efficiently for any follow-up care. Overall great place.

name: Dennis Olinger
text:
So my two year old son fell and busted his mouth on our driveway one evening. His front tooth got knocked in and was terribly crooked. Blood was everywhere...
My wife was at work..and needless to say..I was a little panicked. My wife came home and we started calling dentists. We came to find out that most dentists are closed on Friday..and it was Thursday evening when this occurred. My son has been a patient at Deerfoot Dental since his teeth really started coming through. We left a message after hours and Dr. Grovestein called us back! He asked us to text him photos of my sons teeth. We sent the pics and he called us back. He reassured us that it probably wasn’t as bad as it seems and he would meet us at his office the next morning. So he opened his clinic for us on his day off! I mean who does that? He gave us instructions to care for the tooth, we made a follow up appointment, and left. Needless to say..our sons tooth looks great. It actually straightened out almost back to its original spot. We went to our follow up appointment and got the good news that his teeth looked great and to just keep a watch on it. I have never in my life experienced customer service from a healthcare provider like this. We are still in shock that someone would care so much about the wellbeing of our son. They have earned a customer for life.

resp.text: It was my pleasure to check your son! Thank you for the kind words!

Just drive right on by!!

resp.text: We understand that you are upset. This is not the place to go into details, as we always protect our patient's confidentially. Know that we will always do what is necessary to protect our patient's saftey.

name: RC Hunting
text:
My elderly mother had a toothache, so I called her normal dentist, The Dental Office in Moody. We scheduled an appointment, got ready and drove her down there. After we had waited about 10 minutes, we were informed that she could pay out of pocket or reschedule because her insurance provider's site was down. I asked the obvious question, "Why can't she be seen now and file her insurance later?" The receptionist took my question to someone in the back. She came back with the answer that doing it that way would be insurance fraud! Whaaat?!?!?!?!?

I called my dentist's office in Birmingham, told them the situation. The lady who does the billing and insurance happened to be the person who answered the phone. She said that was the craziest thing she'd ever heard. Needless to say, I will not be taking any of my family to The Dental Office in Moody again.
If they will turn away an old lady in pain, what might your future hold if You decide to use them?

name: Randy Langley
text: Came in for my scheduled cleaning and Maddie worked on me. She is very professional, is gentle and very thorough. It was the best cleaning I've ever had.  You Rock Maddie! Keep up the good work.

name: patrick c
text:
Erica is the best. If you want a good cleaning with no pain, she’s the hygienist for you, an Dr. Engel is just the best.
I love going there & I hated the dentist for most of my life.

name: Lisa Love
text: On April 24th, 2021, I Lisa Love a new patient of The Dentist Office of Moody, Al. I had a filling come out  of my back molars tooth. With such a awesome dentistry team working together such as Dr. Cordero DMD and his amazing assistants named Kayla, Laura, & Arlene it turned out I needed a root canal. Dr. Engle DMD came in to give a second opinion and all was confirmed it was definitely in need of a root canal. At this time I overheard there was three root canals in a row. Well, without any hesitation the whole staffing jumped into gear and with great performance I was all done with prescriptions for pain in hand. With my deepest sincerely and my great surprise the pain meds were unnecessary because I never had to use them. I never felt any pain. I guess that what you call a outstanding dentistry office. I give them a TEN!!!! ( For Most Satisfied New Patient)

name: Jennie Rhymer
text: I’ve been going to the dental office since I was a kid. They have progressively got worse over the last few years. I would not recommend to anyone and will be looking for a new dentist today.

resp.text: Hi Jennie, sorry we did not meet your expectations.  The issue with the insurance plan was out of our control.  Our insurance staff do everything in their power to get as many details as possible from insurance companies. Many times we are advised by an insurance company to have the employee read their handbook.  It is NOT the response we want but it is what we get more times than we would like.  We will send your records to any dentist of your choosing.  We wish you the best.

name: Ullman Mitchell
text: Doctor Engle & his staff are great!!

name: • K I M B E R L Y •
text: This place is AMAZING! After going to 5 different places and not being helped, I came across this great place and not only were they super nice, they were able to help me and give me what I need and want! I definitely recommend this place to everyone!!! Also, I have to point out that the office manager is an agel!! She was extremely helpful and nice to me! Thank u everyone who helped me! Yall made my Christmas!!

resp.text: We are lucky to have so many AMAZING patients.  You are one of them.  THANK YOU and Happy Holidays!

name: Reginald Tillis
text: Dr. Engle and his staff are the best! I love the way he jiggles your face before he numbs you to ease your anxiety. I would recommend The Dental Office Of Moody to anyone!

resp.text: THANK YOU Reginald.  Your comfort is important to us.  Dr. Engle has alot of tricks for making numbing you up easier.  Happy Holidays!

name: Audra Widner
text: I went to get a cleaning and have previous dental work looked at. The dentist said I needed 3 filling which seemed kind of odd considering I had just been to a different dentist 2 weeks prior and I was cavity free. But I trusted him and he did 2 fillings and the 3rd filling he just put a deep hole in my bottom tooth and sent me home. When I got home I realized there was a big deep open hole in my tooth. So I go back up there to have it filled. The dentist said out loud, "why did I do that?" Which lets me know he messed up. While he was sticking needles in my mouth to numb everything, which never got numb, he hit one of my top teeth with the needle and made a hole. The whole procedure was so incredibly painful and they just kept going. So now I have to get that hole fixed plus the tooth he put a deep hole in then filled, it still hurts. Also while drilling he hit so many surrounding teeth with the drill, made punctures and grooves in teeth that are now sensitive.  I can't chew  anything even a little bit crunchy on the right side of my mouth.  When I called asking for a refund nobody ever got back with me and they feel like they did everything right. I wish I had never came and trusted them to touch my teeth because they were just fine and pain free before all this. I'm calling the Dental Board and the Better Business Bureau.

name: Mark
text: The front office staff is completely incompetent. They have issues verifying your insurance and insist on getting you SSN (which is not needed as long as they have the Name and plan number of your insurance). They have a high turnover of Dentist. So if the practice is ran like the front office I understand why they have a high turnover. So enter at your own risk.

resp.text: Hello. Insurance companies OFTEN require the ss# of the insured. Name and plan # do not identify the individual insured. Thankfully you have many offices to choose from. We wish you well.

name: Trishia Layfield
text: The office staff is unorganized and quite rude. My husband and I will find a different dental office to go to...

resp.text: Hi Trisha. We were more than happy to work in Mr. Layfield even though his appointment was on a different day. Sorry he felt we were rude for trying to work this out for him. It takes a few minutes to accommodate unscheduled appointments.

name: Amy Cone
text: Excellent Service, Nice friendly staff,  2 root canals in less than a week, they were able to take my pain away!  The doctor is easy on the eyes too ;)

name: Ja Smith
text: I would gladly give more stars, if it were possible.  Dr Engle took a bad experience and turned it around completely. These teeth fit perfectly!  I recomend them 110%.  Best experience at the dentist I've  ever had!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this humbling review. You made it easy.  We appreciate you!

name: karen everett
text: Had an appointment scheduled for today. They left a message asking that I call and confirm the appointment. I called and confirmed when I woke up. Found out this morning from my Emergency contact they called them yesterday to change my appointment. A fact they didn't bother to tell me personally when I called to confirm. Not to mention calling an emergency contact over a non-emergency

resp.text: Emergency contact should not be used for appointment reminder. Our mistake. Thank you for sharing your experience.  Glad you gave us another opportunity to be better.

name: Valerie Tyler
text: I had a tooth extracted in October and had many complications from it. Rather than being rude and frustrated to see me for 3 separate follow ups over the course of 2 months for what should have been a minor procedure, Dr. Cordaro was extremely generous and did whatever he could to help fix the pain I was in.

resp.text: Hi Valerie, complications happen from time to time and we want our patient to be comfortable and out of pain.  There are all kinds of reasons a patient can have complications that can not be predicted or prevented.  There is never a good reason to be rude!  Thank you for being a great patient!

name: Jessica Carmichael
text: They get you in and out quick and they make sure your comfortable

resp.text: IMPOSSIBLE         Brittany,  I looked at your chart and your daughter would have to be very young.  WE DO NOT put children to sleep - ever!   I think this review is for some other office.    I hope you locate the correct office.  205 640 1717  Tamie

Janie Norris

name: Michaela Newell
text: Dr. Engle is hands down the best dentist you will ever see. He is VERY knowledgeable and he takes the time to share with you the information to why you need certain procedures. Dr. Engle has done many procedures on me a root canal, build-up and crown, pulled a tooth, placed a bone graft, placed an implant and an implant crown, a few fillings, and now he is doing my Invisalign treatment. Dr. Engle is the only dentist that I have ever had that can give an injection (numbing medicine) and it not hurt. He always try’s his best to make sure that you are completely comfortable before he starts any procedure. There is absolutely no one else I would trust more than him. His kind heart pours into his work. You can definitely tell he loves what he does. He is always putting his patients first. The office is always so nice and clean. Whitley, my hygienist is also amazing. She works very hard to make sure you are comfortable during your cleaning. The office as a whole is just wonderful. I used to have anxiety about going to the dentist but Dr. Engle and his staff have completely changed that for me.

text: I recently switched dental offices and I have to say this is the best I’ve ever been to .  The staff are so friendly and it’s very easy to get an appointment.  They also offer a variety of services to fit your needs. I have also had my teeth whitened by them for my wedding and I was not at all expecting this much of a difference. Excellent dental office I highly recommend!

name: Blake Howard
text: Had a root canal and crown. After getting the crown I mentioned that the tooth was still hurt. I was told it simply couldnt because there werent any nerves to hurt. Now 6 months later sometimes when eating it will ache like it was before the root canal.

resp.text: Hello Mr. Howard.  THANK YOU for posting this in a public forum.  It helps us to know what is going on with patients and gives us insight for where we can improve.  Speaking in general terms,  other teeth on either side of the one treated can cause pain.  You may call our office to schedule for any remaining treatment or we will forward your xrays to an office of your choice.  Thank you again and best wishes to you.

Allison, we are here for your dental needs. Even though you said you were nervous you did GREAT!
Thank YOU for being an awesome patient.

text: I went in for my teeth cleaning and right from the start I was pleased. the staff was very nice and I was able to get back in a timely manner and while I was back getting work done they always made sure that I was comfortable. the staff  from the time I walked through the door to leaving was very nice and considerate. I would definitely highly recommend them for any dental needs.

resp.text: Thank you Katlin.   This is what we strive to do for every patient.

name: Kendall hubbard
text:
Lisa Hubbard, Dr. Anthony Engle is amazing.   Dr. Engle had to put a LOT of shots in my mouth for both appointments.  The most dreaded part of any dental visit. I have NEVER had a dentist that could give you these shots without killing you.  Well Dr. Engle CAN.    If you have a fear of the dentist as I do,  I promise Dr. Engle is the dental professional for you.  I cannot thank Dr. Engle enough for the beautiful smile he has given me.
His staff is professional, friendly, and caring.  I Highly recommend  Dr. Engle and his staff at The Dental Office of Moody.    Lisa Hubbard 4/10/2020

resp.text: Thank you sweet lady!

name: Julie Glenn
text: I took my girls to this office, because it was the closest. Our first time in there my fifteen year old daughter was told that the black from the Fluoride would be between her teeth and we wouldn’t be able to see it. She went out to the car and I finished paying the copay. When I got out to the car she had black all over her teeth, all over her mouth, splattered all of her arms, and on her brand new jeans she was wearing. The second time I took my sixteen year old daughter to have a filling done. She was flossing two days later and the filling came out. She had to have shots in her mouth again to fix it. Never has there been an apology. I was told my youngest daughter could wash the black splatters off with soap and water that she smeared all over herself. It was not smeared. You could see were it landed all over her from them working on her mouth. This place is ridiculous. If you are reading reviews the are giving away a TV if you leave a good review.

I will call you on Monday and see if there is anything we can do to correct this.  We do care about our patients.  My name is Tamie Smith.  I am the business admin for the practice.  Please feel free to reach out to me anytime.  205 640 1717.  I look forward to resolving this on Monday.  Thank you again.

text: I went recommend a dog to go here because they do not care about your time, you can show up on time for a appointment and still wait 45 minutes to get seeing they are bad overbooking patience.

resp.text: Mr. Horn, any delays in our office is not about over booking. We have two doctors and four hygienists. The doctors and hygienists work efficiently and carefully with each patient. Some patients and/or the treatment requires extra time in the chair. Once treatment begins, we are bound to complete it. We can not ask a patient to get out of the chair just because their time is up. We take the time needed for each person. We may not be the fastest but we CARE about every patient. Whether you stay with us or any great office the first appointment of the day may be best for your schedule.

name: pam calamusa
text: I found this place through a web search under the search term "denture repair while you wait." So, I called them and told them how my eye tooth on my upper denture had broken off. The lady said come on in and we will help you with that. I was so excited and hopeful! I went to their office, filled out paperwork, presented insurance cards, etc. They took me back, put me in a dental chair, the dentist came in and said we can't help you, we don't have a lab on site. I suspect that they could have repaired it, but the cost would be too low for their taste. If you're gonna advertise dentures repaired while you wait on the interweb, you should probably offer that actual service. Of course they were happy to give me a quote for a whole new denture! False advertising? At the very least. In the future if I do buy a new set of dentures, it will most definitely not be from these yahoos!  Tom Calamusa

resp.text: Unfortunately, all denture repairs can not be done in office.  Our goal is to give you the best service possible.    Sorry we did not meet your expectations.

text: Great dentist and staff. They are the best when it comes to dentist issues. Will work you in if you are having a problem tooth and they are open on a few Saturday mornings also.

name: Kristin
text: Dr. Mcclain is a awesome dr. He will be the only one I go to if I ever want to have anything else done. His staff is great and love Casey. They checked on me after my surgery and sent me some beautiful flowers. Dr. Mclain is truly a awesome dr and glad I found him.

name: Meleah Davis
text: I had been putting off an implant on a front tooth for a long time. Finally couldn't wait any longer. Dr. McClain and his staff were calm and patient with me during this process. I had little to no bleeding or pain after the initial surgery and Dr. McClain called to check in on me that same day. My nurse, Casey, was incredible. Talk with me through my nerves and answered all my questions. I like them so much I am taking my teen for her wisdom teeth extractions later this summer.

name: Elysia Taylor
text: Dr. Landon McLain really takes his time to listen to what your goal is, he speaks to you very personally and he never makes you feel rushed or that you’re just a dollar amount in front of him. He is so incredibly kind as is his staff as well. He provided me his personal cell number after surgery and told me not to hesitate to call or text him for anything at anytime. He has routinely checked on me as well, I couldn’t imagine a better customer service. No matter what questions you may have they never make you feel like it was a silly question and are always very helpful. He works with you to help you achieve your goal based on your what your body can give you. I absolutely love him as a surgeon and have been recommending him to all my friends. He also does AMAZING lip fillers as well. I’ve had mine done by him the last two years and every time they honestly look better than the “wish” pictures I’ve shown him. If your thinking about it or on the fence, just trust him and his crew! They will take care of you. He even had the most beautiful Bouquet I’ve ever seen sent to my house after surgery and continuously makes sure my pain level is at a tolerable level. I’ll definitely continue going to him for all my cosmetic needs.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review, Elysia Taylor! Feel free to text this number any time and we'll respond ASAP.

name: Greta Jones
text: Very quick service. I came in as a new patient and was able to complete new patient paperwork online which made it super fast to get in and out. Staff is beyond friendly and welcoming!!! Dr McClain listens to the patient and doesn’t try to “push” anything extra on you and wonderful bedside manner! Definitely can’t wait to go back in!!! Thank you for making my first appointment awesome!!
