text: Great Staff. Dr Mclain is awesome. Does super job. And i would recommend him hands down.

name: Sarra Harrell
text: the entire staff is so sweet, and you can trust that Dr. McLain knows exactly what he’s doing!! i am beyond impressed and more than happy with the results of my breast augmentation. 1000/10 would recommend 🙏🏻

name: RC Gray
text: Lovely people. Wonderful doctor. Would recommend the center to anyone.

name: Carmen King
text: I had a tummy tuck now 2 weeks ago and I could not be more pleased! Dr McLain and staff are the best! Dr. McLain did an amazing job and will forever be the only doctor to do my Future procedures. I highly highly recommend him!!!

name: Angela Hardy
text: Everyone in this place were absolutely wonderful. From the young lady at the front desk and everyone in between. I had a tooth really hurting me over a week. Called around and no surgeons could work me in. I found this place online and sent a message over the weekend. They got me in first thing Monday afternoon for a consultation and surgery Tuesday morning. Dr. MClain was so nice and made me feel at ease even though I was in pain. He even called yesterday afternoon to check up on me. I will definitely recommend this place to anyone needing a tooth extraction.

name: Michael Harrington
text: Went great, was what I expected had no pain issues and very professional.

name: Lu Reed
text: Very sweet staff! Awesome Dr who explains and goes over treatment clearly! Clean inside the facility and time efficient!

name: jewlani Sharp
text: My husband had surgery earlier this week and it was super quick and easy. When he sobered up from anesthesia all he did was brag about how professional everyone was. We have been here twice now and we have always had a positive experience.

name: C Dills
text:
I was very impressed by the entire team at McLain Surgical Arts. Staff is super sweet and very helpful. Extremely impressed with Dr. McLain. I am very particular about the physicians I choose. Dr. McLain is a double  board-certified physician who is really nice and down-to-earth. I felt very comfortable discussing my dental issue with him.

No dental procedure is ever “fun“ - especially when a tooth must be extracted, but the procedure was done in a second it seemed. Of course, I asked to be sedated so I didn’t feel a thing! Everything went very well! The procedure took half an hour from start to finish and that includes checking in and out.

Once I arrived home, I had a few questions which they responded to on-the-spot. I’m currently in the process of  healing and waiting for the implant procedure. Everything’s gone exactly as planned and I’ve had zero issues.

I would absolutely recommend 100%. If you’re fearful in seeing an oral surgeon, don’t be. Don’t ignore the pain, McLain Surgical Arts will take great care of you! Waiting only makes matters worse. I needed this procedure done a few months ago but due to Covid I was afraid to see a doctor. The entire staff follow CDC Covid procedures. You have the option of waiting in your vehicle versus their waiting room, which I thought was great! Check out their website, and again don’t put it off because it’ll only get worse... 😕

name: Alexandra Hattaway
text: Dr. Mcclain and his staff are very professional and the office is extremely clean!

name: Tia Wheeler
text: Excellent care for oral surgery. Surgeon and staff were very concerned with my well being. Doctor called on a Saturday to check on me. Never had to wait more than a few minutes.

name: Paul Dixon
text: Warning they do not accept single patients must have family in area can not use uber or a payed driver.  also they will not work with you on scedual they say they are available but then are not . I highly recommend not using this doctor .

resp.text: We do require an escort to take sedated patients home and unfortunately ride services do not meet the requirements.  If you have procedures done without IV sedation or general anesthesia, an escort is not required.

name: Kristina Vincent
text: I can’t thank Dr. McLain enough for taking care of my son this morning. My son’s dentist contacted Dr. McLain about removing his wisdom teeth after he came home from college in horrible pain. Within an hour he worked him into his schedule. From checking-in to leaving his office (without the 4 painful wisdom teeth) was approximately one hour. The staff was so kind and professional, as well as super efficient. I’m a super grateful mom who highly recommends McLain Surgical Arts.

name: Andrea Smith
text: Had a great experience with him and his staff. My procedure was quick, recovery was easy with minimal pain and no scarring, and I'm happy with my results. I'm hoping to get another procedure soon! Highly recommend!

name: Vickie Shaw
text: For someone who doesn’t like to go to the dentist, much less have an extraction, Dr. McLain and his staff were fantastic. They totally put me at ease from the receptionist to the hygienist to Dr. McLain. I would highly recommend his office!!

name: Wendy Smithson
text: If I am going to be honest, the Holy Spirit lead us to this place.  When we began the journey to have surgery done on my son's ear, I searched from Huntsville to Birmingham to other states, but was lead back to McClain Surgical Arts each time.  I cannot begin to tell you how wonderful and professional Dr. McClain and his staff have been.  My son's surgery went extremely well and we are beyond pleased with the results.  The surgery was performed at Crestwood Medical Center, and again, we could not be more pleased with the service there also.  I highly recommend Dr. McClain and his staff without reservation.

name: Robert littleton
text: Always Very precessional and courteous.

name: stephanie merrell
text: From my initial consultation  to post-op appointment Dr. McLain and his staff treated me with respect, patience and extreme professionalism. My results were better than I could have imagined! I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Jeff Brownback
text: Very knowledgeable Dr. and a friendly staff.

name: Kristen Elmore
text: The staff here is AMAZING! Dr McLain answered all of my many questions, his bedside manners rock, and it’s so personable that he takes the time to call and check on his patients himself! I would 110% recommend this place!

name: Brea Cothren
text: Dr. McLain and his staff are AMAZING!!! They are professional and very welcoming.  I went to him for a mommy make over, and he delivered!! I had breast augmentation and a little liposuction done on my lower abdomen. I couldn’t be any happier with my results. Dr. McLain took time to personally give me a call after post op and even sent me a lovely bouquet of flowers. Casey made sure I was taking care of and that all my questions were answered. She was friendly and made me feel comfortable during the whole experience, as well as, Dr. McLain.  I will definitely go back if I ever decide to have anymore procedures done.

name: tiffany siverling
text: From my first visit to now my first follow up visit Dr.Mclain and his staff have extremly great, they have answered all of my questions from the silly ones to the serious ones. I would recommend and have already recommended them to everyone I know that is looking for plastic surgery! Casey, Becky and Dr.Mclain made me feel 100 % better and not nervous at all!

name: Lucretia Workman
text: Did a fabulous job with extracting a troublesome tooth that my son was in an enormous amount of pain because of the tooth. The procedure went very well. The staff is AWESOME SAUCE!!! 5 star customer service... I'll be returning to have work done on myself. My son said he'd love to return as a established patient of Dr. McLain....

name: Emry McKay
text: Dr. McClain and his staff were kind and helpful.  They addressed all my concerns about repairing a scar from an injury and made me feel comfortable.  Dr. McClain followed up on my progress which I really appreciated.  I would recommend this great team to any one!

name: Allison Thomas
text: I have always had the best experience here. Being in the medical field I appreciate an office that exceeds my expectations. The front office staff is so kind and accommodating! Melanie, Lynn and Taylor are so good at what they do and put me at ease every time.  I highly recommend Dr. McLain and his entire office!!

name: Makeup Fiend
text: Not happy at all. I had lip fillers in January and still have 2 lumps in my top lip. I’m now going elsewhere.

resp.text: Fortunately, all lip fillers used at McLain Surgical Arts are temporary and can also be easily dissolved if any asymmetry develops.  Occasionally, filler treatments will require adjustments.  We sincerely apologize that we didn't meet your expectations for the treatment you underwent.

name: Karlee Stenger
text: I recently had my wisdom teeth extracted at Dr.Mclain’s office. Dr. McLain and his sweet assistant finished the entire procedure quickly and explained all the post surgery instructions to my husband, along with giving us a detailed list of instructions. I get anxious in any doctors office, but the entire staff makes you feel completely at ease! If you are needing dental extractions, I highly recommend going to Dr. McLain!

name: Lacey Gilliam
text: I am so pleased with my visit. I scheduled a consultation but called today to see if I could come earlier. Sweeeeet Nicole placed me on a cancellation list and ended up getting me in. From the moment I walked through the door I knew I had chosen the right place for my first (and all, moving forward) lip fillers. Taylor took AMAZING care of me and was personable, friendly and made me feel at ease. Dr. McLain listed to me and did better than I even hoped for. I felt almost zero pain during the injection. I felt one tiny sting but it was mostly painless. I went straight back to work feeling great. Highly recommend!

name: ThatBMXlover
text: They took out all 4 of my wisdom teeth and I could not have had a better experience. Very professional care, and the surgery went very well with little healing complications. Dr. McLain was extremely professional, well versed, and answered any question I had

name: JACOB ROE
text: I went in just this morning for wisdom tooth removal. The staff was excellent in every way. I was in and out quickly and surprisingly I  am in no pain at all. From the time I arrived to the time I left my needs were met with extraordinary urgency and professionalism that would have exceeded even the highest expectations.  Thank you so much Dr. McLain and staff for your superior customer service and care.

name: Farrah H
text: I called to schedule my daughter’s wisdom teeth removal and asked if they could do removal and consult on the same day. The woman told me they could call and get X-ray and referral from her dentist and that wouldn’t be a problem. Fast forward to today, day of appointment, my daughter called to see if she could eat beforehand and was informed by Nicole they wouldn’t be doing the extractions today. She took off work and schedules have been made. That time and pay is lost along with when she has to take off again for actual surgery. People in that office need to communicate and figure out what is and isn’t possible. Nicole’s nonchalant attitude about my daughter’s lost pay, pain, and wrong communication on their part is completely unprofessional.

name: Angie Jaggers
text: I had THE BEST experience with this practice from the moment I walked in the door.  The entire staff is friendly and professional.  I am so pleased with my breast augmentation!! I am a runner, so it was important to me that I can continue my routine.   Dr. McLain and his entire staff listened to what I wanted, and they exceeded my expectations.  I HIGHLY recommend this office!  The process was easy and literally pain free from start to finish.  Do yourself a favor and consult this practice FIRST!!

name: Rachel Bradley
text: Wonderful office staff, kind and welcoming. Helped with all of my issues! Had my wisdom teeth pulled. Very quick and so far no issues. Would recommend!

name: Amanda Moore
text: Awesome experience!! Very thorough and attentitive, Casey was great with my son for his consultation and his surgery!!

name: William Andrews
text: A family member had a procedure done recently.  The process was smooth. Check-in was efficient and they were taken right to the back.  The procedure was done quickly and went very well.  Good follow instructions were provided and Dr. McClain even called us that evening to check-in to see how the recovery was coming along.  Overall, we were very satisfied with the care we received.

name: Lee, Laugh
text: The friendliest, most courteous, professional office imaginable. But what really matters are the results. I have seen Dr McLain for several procedures and the results have always exceeded my expectations. Highly recommend.

name: sheila Beam
text: I was pretty much sold on Dr. McLain when a friend recommended him to me.  Then I called to set up my consultation and that was all it took.  Finally got to meet Dr. McLain and his staff and WOW!!  Each and every person in that office is there to help you make the right decision and to make sure you are well taken care of.  They treated me like family.  We discussed a breast lift with augmentation.  We were going to do it in one surgery.  Upon further study, Dr. McLain decided to do it in two surgeries instead because he felt like I would get better results and the healing process would be much easier on me.  I am 2 weeks in to the first surgery and I look and feel amazing.  I have no reservations about the second surgery at all. Dr. McLain and the staff at McLain Surgical Arts are just the best.  Call them if you don't believe me.  If you get to talk to Becky or Melissa you will totally agree with me.

name: Mackenzie Moreno
text: AMAZING wisdom teeth experience! Was terrified and have constantly put if off for years, the doctor and staff took all my concerns and questions very seriously and worked hard to make sure I had the answers to every silly question I asked. Which made me as comfortable as possible. Me and my brother got it done the same morning and were in and out in no time. I had zero pain afterwards, so much that I didn't even require the medication. I highly suggest this doctor because the atmosphere and friendly staff put you at ease. This extraction experience was easier and more pain free then some of my cleanings! Thanks again, wish I had done it sooner.

name: Nicole Blas
text: I was supposed to have my wisdom teeth removed with a different dentist and unfortunately that appointment had to be cancelled at the last minute due to some unforeseen circumstances explain I had already taken the time off from to get it done and had been too wait over a month to get approval from job and they were  nice enough to get me in the same day I called and get me in for surgery the next day. They were so nice understanding and very professional. I will recommend them to anyone who ask me for an oral surgeon. Thank you so much for getting me in. I really do appreciate it.

name: Patrick Atkins
text: Fast and professional.

name: Sheila T.
text: They were not 100% truthful about what was going to happen during my TMJ procedure. Their "deep sedation" is a joke. I felt everything and cried throughout the entire procedure. They don't let you get fully awake either before shoving you in a wheelchair and expect you to leave. I expected much better from somone who came so highly recommended.

name: Stefanie Mcclure
text: I always feel so welcomed at Dr. Mclains office! Everyone there is so kind, knowledgeable, and sincere. I highly recommend them for whatever your need is !

name: Celisa Dooley
text: Dr. McLain is absolutely the BEST!! Patient care & satisfaction are definitely at the TOP of his priorities. He and his staff are AMAZING. They take time to answer all questions, and address all concerns. I am VERY pleased with my results!!! If you are considering any kind of cosmetic surgery, he is definitely the right choice!!!

name: Kiarra Lewis
text: I love Dr. McLain. He is by far the best surgeon ever. The office took very good care of me. I received phone calls and cards. I even received beautiful flowers the day after my procedure. I will recommend Dr. McLain to anyone who’s looking to upgrade their look. He made me so comfortable I felt like I knew him for years. He gave me exactly what I wanted.  Thanks Dr. McLain

name: SarahKP
text:
Dr. McLain and his staff are amazing!
I had been through the ringer searching for an oral surgeon, trying to find one that would actually treat me like a person rather than just another case, one that actually cared about helping me deal with the insurance company, as well as come up with proper treatment for my unique case. Dr. McLain was the 4th surgeon I had been to and initially I just went to him for a second opinion but after meeting him and his amazing staff I made the choice to switch surgeons and I'm so glad I did! I underwent corrective jaw surgery and I couldn't be happier with the results. Dr. McLain is very talented and has an eye for aesthetics. I highly recommend him no matter if you're looking for oral surgery or cosmetic surgery.

name: Bobby Gilbert
text: Don't normally give a perfect 5 of 5 score, but Dr. McLain was exceptional.  My daughter had 2 wisdom teeth removed which took less than 20 minutes.  At 7pm that night, Dr. McLain  called to check on her then gave us his cell phone number and told us to call if there were any problems.

name: Haley Jones
text: Dr. McLain and his staff are beyond WONDERFUL! Due to my wisdom teeth becoming very painful as well as a few other issues, I was able to get in and have them removed within a matter of two to three hours from first calling them. I had called several places who weren't going to be able to do same day surgery but they managed to get me in as fast as they could. They were all very friendly, very informative and very quick in dealing with my pain. I would recommend them to absolutely anyone who needed this type of surgery done, and more!

name: Aleisha Greenhaw
text: Dr. McLain & the Staff are Wonderful! Very professional, great work, and give a genuine feeling of being cared for as an individual. Highly Recommend! 👍🏼

name: suzystephens
text:
I just had implant surgery four days ago with Dr. McLain. Everyone was telling me it was a very unpleasant procedure, but they were wrong in this case!. The doctor made me wait an extra five minutes on the anesthesia to make doubly sure I was completely numb, which I appreciated. Basically, he didn't try to  rush this at my expense.  And, I felt zero pain, not even any discomfort at all!  Even my stitches (which will dissolve) haven't bothered me.
My husband drove me home, but I could have driven myself, since I didn't even have the expected bleeding.  The anesthesia just barely started wearing off after I'd already taken my first prescription for pain medication, and so I never suffered at all. When I woke up the next morning, I was prepared to take more pain medication, but I realized I didn't need it and never took any more. What a pleasant surprise.
Dr. McLain personally called me the same evening to find out if I was doing okay.
Also, the actual wound was closed up so neatly, you could barely even see it.  Maybe that's because the doctor is also a cosmetic surgeon.  After this experience, I would wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Mclain to anyone. Quick, and painless, and NO complications.

name: seth mazyck
text: Everyone was very kind to me.  The staff was very friendly, and the doctor was very punctual.

name: Cathy Eacret
text: I am going to Dr. Mclain after 2 different implants failed. I was extremely apprehensive about getting it done for the 3rd time but after talking with Dr. Mclain, I have became less fearful and my surgery is in about a month. I can’t believe I am saying this but I am less fearful than I have ever been knowing that I will be having surgery soon. Dr. Mclain is very compassionate and his entire staff is awesome. I have never experienced this kind and compassion and kindness ever before. I know my surgery is going to go well and I just wished Dr. Mclain and his entire staff knew how much that means to me after being physically abused by a dentist. I trust Dr. Mclain 100%, and I have never ever felt like this in my entire child and adult life. Thank you Dr. Mclain and staff!! You are the best!!!!!

name: Mark Quick
text: My wife had jaw surgery this morning. They took excellent care of her and were very informative on what was going on and what they was doing. They even came in early to get her in. She was referred to them from the emergency room that she was seen at last night .

name: Nicole Richard
text: Dr. McLain and his staff are patient with their patients!  They answered all my questions about my procedure, which was a tooth extraction.  I was very nervous because this was a permanent tooth.  Tooth was removed with NO pain and very minimal pain thereafter, really only a little discomfort.  I credit Dr. McLain for his skill.  Nothing like having a skilled doctor.  While there, I discovered Dr. McLain is also a plastic surgeon.  At age 55, I can use some help but was always uneasy with finding a good doctor that wouldn't do more harm than good.  I'm not sure I want to have anything done, but I now know who I'd go to.

name: Bailey Benton
text: highly recommend them for wisdom teeth removal!! i was in and out in about half an hour and my soreness levels have been very low. they were extremely efficient and professional! i hate waiting at the doctor's office and i certainly didn't have to do that here. if i had to get my wisdom teeth removed again, i'd come back here

name: MeeMoe's Wit and Wisdom
text: Professional and thorough, Dr. McLain and his staff put you at ease and help you make the best decision concerning a treatment plan.

name: Alexander Biega
text: I had a great experience and will definitely go back if I need anything else.

name: Anita Seldon
text: Dr.  Mclain is great! My extractions  were done expertly and it was over in less than 10 minutes.  Staff is wonderful! Having trismus, I wasn't at all certain  the nitrous oxide would work.  It worked like a charm.  Nice group of professionals.

name: Dee Carter
text: Dr. McClain is awesome!!!

name: Joyce Cooper
text: Scheduled  appointments are meant with little to no wait time. The office staff are always professional and courteous. All procedures are fully explained. I would definitely recommend.

name: Jasmine “Jassie Creations” Neal
text: Clean and friendly place. The staff was nice and my cleaning was good. I will continue to go.

name: Anoymous Ok
text: Can someone tell me why their is not a full time receptionist to answer the phone.

name: Lena Dillon
text: Cumberland Dental takes excellent care of my dental needs.

name: Dorothy Johnson
text: I like the service, staff was very nice and generous I'm looking forward to my next visit.   Thank you.

name: Becky Shirley
text: My mother had to have a crown replaced. They told her a price and what her part was going to cost. She paid it right then. After 2 months the procedure was finished, why it took 2 months is beyond me. They are now sending her bills for more money even after the insurance company has paid their part too. Also charged the insurance company for 2 tooth crowns and not just one.

name: BJ Kidd
text: Terrible experience.  Unorganized.  Worked on the correct tooth for one family member but applied Novocain shots to the wrong side of the mouth.  Performed a filling that is failing only after a couple of months.  Another family member sat in the Dentists chair for 2 hours and 30 min without performing any work.  Billing was also a headache very difficult to work with and a confusing bill.  Complete waste of time and money.

name: Keith Foshee
text: Was referred to this place by my Dental Insurance Company.    Called at  3 various times during business hours and got answering service every time.    Very little command of English language.    Left message on 3rd try for someone to please call me back to schedule an appointment.    24 Hours have passed and still no call.    If this is an indication of how they run the business- then I wouldn't do business with them anyway.    So very unprofessional.

name: kash05052010
text: Anita is awesome! She’s sweet and does her job well!!

name: Amberlyn Porter
text: Tammy was my dental hygienist and she was amazing. I absolutely love how comfortable and aware she made me in the time of my visit. This place is definitely home for me!

name: James Mucha
text: From the front counter upon entering the facility, to the dental hygienist, to Dr. White, I received phenomenal service and a thorough exam. Staff were very friendly and professional. I know what to expect each and every visit and have never been disappointed. I will continue my dental care at Cumberland.

name: Kindeth Martin
text: Very rude unprofessional group. I called to get a bill resolved because they did not file my insurance, (which I gave them the correct insurance card at the time of my appointment), she told me she'd have to send my information to corporate, (which was suppose to be done at my appointment) and I told her I didn't care what they had to do, I just wanted my bill resolved, I got hung up on. I called back, I asked for a supervisor, I was told a supervisor would call me, (mind you none of my information was asked for) I asked her is she was gonna take my information, in a smart tone she said "We have called ID", I explained to her I was calling from work and wanted them to call me back on my cell phone, well then she proceeded to remember who I was. Please do not waste your time here, they do not care about you nor your health and the also will not allow you to make payments on your bill. Go to someone who cares because its obviously not this group.

name: LWV Tuscaloosa
text: I have been going to Cumberland Dental for 8 years.  Right after I moved to Tuscaloosa the front half of a molar broke off.  I picked Cumberland Dental from the Yellow Pages, found that it takes my dental insurance and got a prompt appointment with Dr. White.  He made a crown for the tooth that is completely satisfactory after 8 years.  He has replaced a couple of old fillings and the new ones are fine.  Emily, the hygienist who takes care of my routine visits, is really competent, professional and friendly.  I certainly would recommend both of them to anyone.

name: Raymond C
text: There is a long wait time between visits but Dr White is excellent. He does not hurt you when he gives the numbing shot. The assistants are mostly nice. However whoever they call in to do tooth extractions will hurt you. I wish Dr. White would teach them how to give a shot.

name: Alethia Smith
text: This is the worst dentist ofice, to go too! The woman that did my cleaning, had a nasty and unprofessional attitude. She didn't speak to me or ask how i was doing and act like she really hated her job. I want EVER go back there. So please stop emailing me..for a follow up on my cleanings. I have never ever experienced such bad attitudes in my whole life on earth. The equipment , looks horrible and looks old. I can go on. I should of left as soon as i meet the woman that i dealt with. She looked so mean and unhelpful. You all want ever have to worry about me EVER again. I wasn't comfortable at all in there.She acted like she was even more mad, because i had braces on and that i just needed to get a cleaning. They need to fire her. She is one of the main reasons..you all or getting bad business. Please get more educated and professional workers in there. Its like going to hell and back, going there straight up.  People, please take my advice and don't waste your money or time!!!!!! No stars, none whats so ever! I'm still pissed off. Hate i had to even like one star...to submit this post.

name: Sheila Garner
text: I have had a wonderful experience!!!! Couldn’t ask for better service, friendly and helpful staff! Staff takes time to answer questions that you may have, I highly recommend them!!!

name: Mary Black
text: Every one is caring and they took great Care of my needs. I have high anxiety and they were great helping me stay calm etc.

name: Sherri Custred
text: Came here for implant surgery. Am now 5 MONTHS BEHIND schedule because their implant dentist and scheduler can't seem to get things right. I have rearranged my schedule to be here 5 TIMES and been told I have to reschedule. As soon as I am finished here,  I WILL NEVER COME TO THIS OFFICE AGAIN. IF I HADN'T MADE THE MISTAKE OF PAYING FOR ALL OF MY PROCEDURES I WOULDN'T EVER COME BACK!

name: Shamaria Borden
text: The first visit wasn't bad at all. The lady who did my cleaning was very informative and nice. However, I have been rescheduled 3 consecutive times for my cavities to be filled. Whoever this lady is, who's supposed to perform my fillings, has been out of the office seems for months now. My rescheduled appts. have now ran into a 3 month period. It's extremely frustrating. I have chosen to switch dentists.

name: Kimberly Johnson
text: They make you feel comfortable during your stay, I was very impressed with the care that I had!! I would definitely refer anyone to Cumberland dental!!!

name: Js Bell
text: Everyone was very nice and professional. Procedure was quick and painless.😊

name: Sandi Moss
text: Horrible! Worst place to ever go!!!! I was charged for some procedures twice one procedure I didn't need at all! I wear a medical bracelet AND my file list my allergies in BOLD LETTERS and the dentist completely overlooked it proceeded to touch me. Ihad to leave and spend 2 days in the hospital because my throat began to close! I DO NOT ADVISE ANYONE TO GO HERE AT ALL!

name: Kat Robison Hasani
text: Waited over an hour and after showing up early and still hadn’t seen the actual dentist and they couldn’t even say when the dentist would be in. We left. Worst dental experience ever.

name: Ashley Delahanty
text: I'm 30, I've had a lot of dental work in my life and the oral surgeon is the first to actually make me cry. She was so rough and to top it off, I still have pieces of tooth sticking out of my gum causing a lot of discomfort. My experience was so unpleasant, I don't even want to go back for her to check on it

name: Cheryl Farley
text: I have been a customer of Dr. White's for over thirty years.  I always refer people looking for a dentist. Also my dental hygienist Montana and Dr. White really care about they patient's. 👍

name: Shalandra Washington
text: Ms. Anita is awesome. This last visit was great and very timely.

name: Natalie Davis
text:
Normally I go to the dentist at home but it was an emergency. I woke up one morning with a lot of pain and swelling. I went in and they gave me some antibiotics and ask I return to have the tooth fixed on completion of my antibiotics. The service from this visit was great!
I returned on completion of my antibiotics and that's when the trouble started. They decided I needed to get a root canal on the tooth. It was still very sensitive and painful. The hygienist was very general when taking x-Rays and getting me into my room. The dentist came in and put a bit of numbing medication on my gums. The shot was done before the gum was numb and he started the dental work before the tooth was numb. He would not stop no matter what the hygentist or I did. I walked out of the office in tears and it wasn't until I got to my car the full effect of the numbing medication kicked in. The office staff and hygentist all seemed very upset about how the doctor did this. Needless to say I did not return to have my permanent crown done at this office and for purposes of all emergencies will seek care elsewhere!

name: Jackie Easterwood
text: EVERYONE is always friendly to me i like that the wait time is not long

name: Deborah Crocker
text: I have been going there for 25 years. Some of the personnel have changed over the years but I have never had a problem with anyone or anything.

name: D Pohl
text: Dishonest and predatory practices.  Completely unsatisfactory.  Complaint filed with the Better Business Bureau.

name: Earl Ike-German
text: Awesome staff!! Anita and Dr. White are the best!!

name: Donna Lockett
text: Don't think I would recommend anyone here..the nusrse that took my xrays was so harsh with the tools she had to do it with and my tongue still hurts and she smelled like a pack of cigarettes.. Then they said I had to schedule two appointment to do the work they need to do.but I think this office just want money...#Needs major improvements

name: Temeka Johnson
text: My experience with Cumberland Dental was awful, I had to go back several times for work that was done to be  done over again, like my filling came out within 2 or 3 day after being put in then when I went back he stuck a needle n my gum where I had no teeth at now that spot is hurting so bad I don't know what to do and the filling has came out again

name: Kristin Heard
text: I went to this dentist and they told me I had 100 cavities. Of Course I went to get a second opinion because I thought 100 cavities was absurd. Once I received a second opinion from a different dentist office,  I was then told I didn't have any.

name: Mike Howell
text: My experience here was good.. Dr. White and the staff treated me well and my problem was taken care of..

text: False Advertising THE RECEPTIONIST TURNED ME AROUND AT THE DOOR..they DO NOT ACCEPT WALK-Ins

name: Michael Lindsey
text: They are expensive, unorganized, unprofessional and SLOW!

name: Brandi Graham
text: I highly recommend Northcutt Dental in Bay Minette, they thoroughly explained my treatment plan and gave me several options as well. The staff is very courteous and friendly.

name: Bobbie Caraway
text: I love Northcutt! I love Dr Peterson! Dr Peterson makes you feel comfortable. The whole atmosphere at Northcutt is like no other to me. Super nice people!

name: Brenda C
text: The staff was so friendly. I am a very nervous & anxious person but they were so sweet & understanding.  Dr. Peters was awesome.  This was the first time I have been to the dentist ever & had NO pain. She is the best. I would definitely recommend!!

name: Troy Mims,Sr
text: Very professional and Very good customer service. I came from Florida to Bay Minette for care at this location. The doctor has a excellent bedside manner,  she cares ,she is Good, she helps as much as she can... I am very happy and I highly recommend  NORTHCUTT Dental #1.😁❤️🙏✌🏽

name: Glenda Averett
text: I was treated very nice by all staff. And was satisfied with the dental work.

name: sneerious grinch
text: The staff at this dental practice are all beyond amazing. Everyone is very professional and  very organized. I was given a very clear explanation of pricing and procedure. The women up front as well as the techs in the back were very knowledgeable and extremely patient with my dumb questions. The dentist, Dr Peter's is a master at dentistry. She was very thorough with everything and confident in her work. It is obvious she has a passion for what she does. The quality of care that was provided was absolutely outstanding. Any fears I had about having dental work done are gone and I actually look forward to going back. The peace of mind from knowing you are getting the best is worth every penny. I would highly recommend this dental practice to everyone.

name: Tee Huff
text: THIS IS THE BEST DENTAL OFFICE TO COME TO IN BALDWIN COUNTY!! LOVE THE STAFF FROM THE FRONT DESK,  DENTAL ASSISTANTS, & TO THE DENTIST! 😍

name: Deidra Edington
text:
Awesome staff! The assistant went out of her way to be sure I was comfortable! She went as far as singing a song for me!

Seriously though, great staff and I was in and out!

name: Mark Whittington
text: I am pleased with Northcutt Dental in every way. From the moment you arrive you are treated with great care that is personal and professional.

name: Caroline McConathy
text: Highly recommend Dr. Schneider in Bay Minette. I didn’t even know he had given me a shot, when I had some fillings done. If you have to go to the dentist, go to him. The staff are warm and explain the costs to you upfront. Liz did a great job cleaning my teeth and it was painless.

name: Kellie Simpson
text: Truly the greatest dental visit my husband and I have ever had! The staff are very knowledgeable and go above and beyond to ensure you are comfortable and understand the treatment they will provide! We have always procrastinated dental visits, but thank goodness we no longer have to! We love Northcutt Dental Bay Minette!!! ♥️

name: Yvonne McWilliams
text: The staff was very polite from the time I walked in until the time I walked out...each and everyone

name: Brittany Tindle
text: Extremely friendly staff. The hygienist took her tome while cleaning my teeth, the dentist did a comprehensive exam of my teeth, and the office manager spent a great deal of time with me going over my treatment plan and costs associated. The entire process was excellent. I highly recommend this entire team. This is my second Northcutt location to visit. All I can say is that HR does a great job with hiring amazing employees.

name: James Mitchell
text: Extremely professional,  hospitable,  and careful.  Highly recommended.

name: Scher Hill
text: Wonderful Dental office! The staff was well-organized professional and continually made sure that I was comfortable and well taken care of. I definitely recommend Northcutt Dental!!!

name: jasmine hansell
text: Very helpful and friendly staff. They were very informative and went over all my options.

name: Jason Lyons
text:
Basically a doc-in-the-box for dentist

Told me one price for an exam and a range for pulling a tooth depending on how hard it was

Charged me more for the exam just to tell me they coulsnt do anything. Wont be back, shouldnt have paid this time

name: Martha Falk
text: My last visit for routine cleaning ended in pain after I can in with no problems.  After 1st followup visit .. pain meds & med rinse prescribed.. I had to return in week bc of continued pain.. My Oral surgeon recommended Antibotics...but Dr Peters would not prescribe.  What!😕

name: Roger Robison
text: Great group of professionals. Thanks for the wonderful care given.

name: Diane Williams
text: The staff at Northcutt Dental are some of the most professional and niciest people that I have ever met. Dr. Peterson  is such a caring professionalist.  She takes so much time with you and has such a great bedside manner. I am so glad to be part of the Northcutt Dental family of Bay Minette, AL. I know that I will be in great hands when it comes to my dental health.

name: Jeremy Mockmore
text: I was beyond pleased with the service at this office, the ladies that helped me showed excellent customer service and patient care was amazing. I’m a nervous wreck at the dentist but once my service was underway I was completely put at ease by how friendly and gentle they were. When I met the dentist she took her time explaining to me what my issues were and the best plan of action to take and why. I’ve never had a doctor of any kind do that for me. I will be returning for all future dental work and I’ve told others how great they treated me.

name: Kayland Lamar
text: Dr. Tucker and her dental assistant Kennedy did an amazing job working together during my procedure. They made me feel comfortable and provided me with a sense of security during the procedure. GO SEE DR. TUCKER! She is amazing! The staff is friendly and helpful!

name: Theresa Padgett
text: I hate going to the dentist,  and in fact avoided going for many years.  I've been using Northcutt dental for a number of years now.  Their staff is amazing, friendly,  courteous,  and patient.

name: Lee Walker
text: I absolutely love this dental practice!  Everyone here has made me feel so welcome.  I am impressed with the up-to-date technology they use also.  Their ability to handle so much in their office is also a plus....as well as their hours of operation.  You won't be disappointed! :-)

name: Anita Sigler
text: Excellent dental hygienist! She was very friendly and tentative! Did a great job with my cleaning!

name: Jamaica Jones
text: I’ve been going here for 2 years now and I absolutely love the service. I recently switched my children so they now go here too. They are very good at explaining everything in language you can understand. So glad I found them.

name: SHERRICK63
text: The entire staff is exceptional, They all work very well together, Great atmosphere. Everyone is very customer oriented and friendly. Twice i have gotten same day service when calling, And the staff met my appointment time with little to no wait. Dr. Knight has been great. He's very informative, friendly and professional.

name: Samantha Day
text: I had a tooth emergency and they were able to see me that day and worked quickly to figure out the problem. All of the staff was very nice and thorough!

name: Zack McGhee
text:
This may be unbelievable, but Northcutt Dental Practice is actually a pleasant place to visit.

I know, I know, what could be so pleasant about a dentistry practice? Everything, to be honest.

The staff are always pleasant and always have a smile ready. They're talkative, and will remember you after only 1-2 visits. Quite a difference from what you will probably find in other practices.

The people actually working on your teeth are very professional and knowledgeable. They know what they're doing and how to get it done with minimal pain. By far the best dental experience I've ever had (and I've had quite a few).

Gentlemen, take note: each and every woman there is a looker. That might not sway your opinion of this establishment, but hey, it doesn't hurt.

In short, Northcutt is the best dental practice around, and if you decide to get some work done, you'll do well to make an appointment with them.

name: Kathy Skipper Buckhault
text: The girls here are friendly,  courteous and treat you like family.   I would recommend Northcutt Dental Practice to everyone.  You can have late appointments, if needed.  I saw Dr. Spivey today and she was amazing.  My cleaning was done by Liz and she was so nice did a great job cleaning my teeth.  Can't wait until February!

name: Cranking Horses
text: Visited there for the first time this week and I have to say by far the best all around service I have ever received,From the time you walk in to the time you walk out everyone one of those young ladies was outstanding in there jobs.I highly recommend this place to everyone.(Island Man)

name: Mary Grace
text: Warm atmosphere !  when you walk in you're always greeted with a friendly smile. The receptionist at the front desk always greet you with welcome to North cut dentist. My two daughters feel very comfortable when they have to get dental work done.

name: Michell Mcmilian
text: They are so professional and nice. I will definitely be going back

name: Chasity Brown
text: The staff is amazing. They were very caring and had a wonderful bedside manner. Would definitely recommend you to use them.

name: Rebekah Tolin
text:
Don't expect pain relief after an extraction. Expect them to fix the complications? Nope. The dentist will call you in & slice on you more, charge money and tell you to put a cold compress on it.
This is bones being pulled from your skull.
Why are you making me suffer?
Don't go to this place.

name: Olivia House
text: I have been with this particular dentist office for 6-7 years now and have absolutely NO plans of changing. Liz is my hygienist, she is very gentle, caring and funny. I urge everyone to try this office for your next checkup, you won't regret it. By the way, you can watch tv while in the chair to ease your nerves and they also sell great prescription toothpaste at the front desk. :)

name: Shaun Livermore
text: Friendly, clean, and efficient office! Liz did a great job on my cleaning. Whitney was willing to joke around with us. Feels like visiting friends instead of the dentist office. Recommend giving them a try.

name: Pam Martin
text: Great place to have your dental care done. I love Liz, she’s my hygienist and does a great job. Bre and Dr Tucker were great today doing my temporary crown!

name: Miranda Bounds
text: The staff at Northcutt Dental consistently go above and beyond.  They are friendly, professional and are great at what they do.  The atmosphere is fresh and modern and very comfortable. My hygienist was the best and answered all of my questions and the Dentist was very thorough.  I highly recommend them.

text: My visit today with northcut dental was excellent. I received excellent care with Dr Peters, and the staff as well. RAVEN IS so attentive at her job. Will continue to be a patient in the future.

text: First impression was a lasting impression!! Great service. Nice Staff. Clean and welcoming office. Liz you were great... Kym Coleman

text: I’m totally terrified of the dentist and have been searching for a number of years for the right sympathetic dentist.  I have super sensitive teeth and the water, air, and the dental tools bring me to tears but the staff listened to my concerns and fears.  I recently had my first procedure and was more at ease the the Northcutt staff than I have been in years.

name: David Caldwell
text: Had a cleaning from Rhonda and it went great. She did an awesome job. I then had a crown prep and Raven was awesome and so was Meranda. They took great care of me and it was an excellent experience.

name: Brian Bfd
text: Minimal wait time, late afternoon appointments available, friendly staff, nice modern facilities and equipment along with a professional atmosphere.

name: charity maestas
text: Northcutt Dental of Bay Minette is simply the best dentist in town! I would highly recommend them for all your dental needs! The staff there are the friendliest and make you feel at ease while your at the dentist. They really care about their patients at Northcutt Dental!

text: By far the best dentist I've been too! Last visit Raven worked with me and she was awesome! So friendly and sweet! Highly recommend Northcutt Dental!

text: I love Northcutt Dental!  All the ladies are always do a great job and are always friendly and professional.  I really recommend them and can't imagine using anyone else!

text: I've been here 3 times and have been happy every visit.I am absolutely terrified of going to the dentist but they were great.I haven't had to wait no more than 5 minutes to be called back each time.

text: I do not enjoy going to the dentist but NorthCutt Dental made my appointment go by very smooth and my nerves settle. Raven weaver kept me entertained and my mind was at ease. Because of this I am actually able to say " I enjoyed my visit to the dentist." They have an m amazing crew and it's great to see so many smiles.  Thank you, NorthCutt for the amazing visit.

name: Connie Wilson
text: I am so glad that we found this dentist office. Everyone that we came in contact with was so nice and helpful. It will definitely be our new dentist office. I would recommend them to everyone!

name: Diam0nd Sakura
text: I love this dentist office. The yare so professional and caring. I been afraid of the dentist, but not anymore thank to them..... and  the laughing gas. I've went to being scared to having braces on my teeth now thanks to the referral.

name: Tiz Day
text: Thank you Nortcutt Dental Practice for taking such good care of my family and our dental health.  The friendly staff was so patient and kind with my boys. It is so nice to have a family, friendly business in our a great city.

name: Jessica Allen
text: Love the doctor and the staff! They are so quick and efficient. Last time I was in, my appt was at 8, and I was out by 8:30! Will never have to find another dentist.

name: Kati Roberson
text: Words cannot express the wonderful experience here at Northcutt. From the moment you walk into the door or even a phone call you are instantly family. The doctors, is specially dr. Tucker, know exactly what they are doing to completely ease and take away any potential pain. As someone who has not been to the dentist in a long time and is scared of dentist. This is the perfect place. I swear they are magicians with how easily they fill cavities, clean teeth, and perform surgeries. Insurance or not this is the only place to get your teeth serviced.

name: Taylor Westwood
text: I got my teeth cleaned by Liz she was kind and gentle. Very professional great atmosphere. I love it there!
